translation.en: Question: How does a girl who falls-- No, actually, she jumps...
translation.zh:
提问 一个女孩跌进…
不对 是主动跳进

translation.en: ...eyes open, down a rabbit hole, plummeting into chaos...
translation.zh:
睁着眼睛 跳进兔子洞里
陷入疯狂的混乱里

translation.en: ...come out the other end unchanged?
translation.zh:
从另一端出来
一切会毫无改变吗？

translation.en: The answer?
translation.zh: 答案是？

translation.en: She doesn't.
translation.zh: 她不可能毫无改变

translation.en: See, I know, because that girl is me.
translation.zh: 我知道答案 因为那个女孩就是我

translation.en: But to truly understand the predicament I was in...
translation.zh: 但是要真正理解我所身处的困境

translation.en: ...i.e., stuck in the middle of chaos...
translation.zh: 就是说 陷在混乱中无法抽身

translation.en: ...you'd have to go back to that first day at my new job.
translation.zh:
那就必须回到我在新的工作岗位上
第一天上班的日子了

translation.en: Actually, to be fair, you should go back a little further...
translation.zh:
实际上 说句公道话
还应该往前推一点

translation.en: ...starting with Mom. Don't worry. I'm not blaming her...
translation.zh:
从我妈开始说起
别担心 我并没有责怪她

translation.en: ...entirely.
translation.zh: 没有完全怪她

translation.en: She believed that all problems could be solved by listening to Carly Simon.
translation.zh:
她坚信所有的问题都可以
通过听卡莉西蒙的歌来解决

translation.en: Greatest Hits.
translation.zh: 精选辑

translation.en: Side two. Hurry.
translation.zh: 第二面 快点

translation.en: Something about her voice, or her lyrics, or her music...
translation.zh:
她的声音 或歌词 或音乐
有一种特质

translation.en: ...helped Mom clear the chaos...
translation.zh: 能够帮助我妈理清混乱

translation.en: ...especially after a fight with Dad.
translation.zh: 尤其是在跟我爸吵架之后

translation.en: Or when he left us for good.
translation.zh: 或是他永远离开我们后

translation.en: People said Mom was better off.
translation.zh: 大家都说没了我爸 我妈会过得更好

translation.en: They said she was lucky. But she believed....
translation.zh: 他们都说她很幸运 但她认为…

translation.en: Luck is when preparation meets opportunity.
translation.zh:
“幸运只不过
是有准备的人遇上了机遇而已”

translation.en: You gotta prepare for the life you want.
translation.zh: 你必须为你想要的生活做好准备

translation.en: And though I knew I wanted a career in broadcast journalism...
translation.zh:
尽管我知道我想要的事业
是成为一位新闻记者

translation.en: ...it took a little Carly and a lot of time...
translation.zh:
但却花了很多时间
听了很多卡莉的歌

translation.en: ...to find the person I most wanted to work with.
translation.zh: 才找到我最想与之共事的人

translation.en: -She is smart and she is learning. -Diane Sawyer.
translation.zh:
-她很聪明 并且踏实肯学
-就是黛安索耶

translation.en: -Chic, smart, intelligent-- -And she married well.
translation.zh:
-高雅 聪明 有智慧
-并且嫁得好

translation.en: Good point.
translation.zh: 说得好

translation.en: -She's a little beige. -No, no, she's taupe.
translation.zh:
-她的肤色有点蜡黄
-不 她那是棕色

translation.en: Taupe is never beige. Taupe's classic. Confident.
translation.zh:
棕色可不是蜡黄
那代表着高雅 自信

translation.en: -It says, "I'm elegant." -"And I don't need color to prove it."
translation.zh:
-仿佛在说“我很优雅”
-“并且我不需要颜色来证明”

translation.en: There you go. I wanna work with her one day.
translation.zh: 没错 我希望有一天能跟她共事

translation.en: -You should work with her. -I will work with her.
translation.zh:
-你的确应该与她共事
-我会与她共事的

translation.en: With my career decided, I left for college...
translation.zh: 事业方向已定 我离开家去上大学

translation.en: ...hopeful I would meet someone I could be certain of.
translation.zh: 希望我能遇到命中注定的那个他

translation.en: -Phillip. -Bruce.
translation.zh:
-菲利普
-布鲁斯

translation.en: -Jeremy. -Noah.
translation.zh:
-杰里米
-吉迪安

translation.en: -Trotsky. -Frank.
translation.zh:
-特洛斯基
-弗兰克

translation.en: -Bean. -Bean? As in, "How have you...?"
translation.zh:
-宾
-宾？是“欢迎来宾”的那个…

translation.en: Bean. Yeah.
translation.zh: 宾 没错

translation.en: -I really, really like him, Mom. -You do?
translation.zh:
-我真的很喜欢他 妈
-是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I do. I think I do. Maybe.
translation.zh: 是的 我觉得是 或许吧

translation.en: Don't over-commit yourself unless you are absolutely certain.
translation.zh:
如果不是完全确定
就千万不要把自己全身心交出去

translation.en: You've gotta prepare for the life you want.
translation.zh: 你必须为你想要的生活做好准备

translation.en: Again, I turned to Carly.
translation.zh: 于是 我再次向卡莉求助

translation.en: And while my roommates weren't as understanding as I'd hoped...
translation.zh:
尽管我的室友们
没我希望中那么谅解人

translation.en: -Come back to bed. -...it did bring certainty.
translation.zh:
-快上床睡觉吧
-但那确实让我心里确定了

translation.en: I'm sorry, Bean.
translation.zh: 对不起 宾

translation.en: We have only but one road to travel in this life.
translation.zh: 我们的人生只有一条路

translation.en: And I just don't think we're on the same one.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们不在一条路上

translation.en: So to get more involved, or for me to over-commit myself...
translation.zh:
所以 如果投入更多
或是让我把自己全身心交出去

translation.en: ...would just lead to chaos.
translation.zh: 只会陷入混乱

translation.en: -How do you know? -I'm certain.
translation.zh:
-你怎么知道？
-我确定

translation.en: I mean, what if you're wrong?
translation.zh: 如果你错了呢？

translation.en: What if we're supposed to be together?
translation.zh: 如果我们是天生一对呢？

translation.en: What if you just made the biggest mistake of your life?
translation.zh:
如果你这是犯了
你这辈子最大的错呢？

translation.en: Stacy, honey! Smile!
translation.zh: 斯黛西 亲爱的 笑一个

translation.en: There are moments in life where you hope your decisions weren't rash.
translation.zh:
在你的人生中 有时候你会希望
你没有那么仓促地做决定

translation.en: Bean! Bean!
translation.zh: 宾…

translation.en: And moments where you just know.
translation.zh: 也有些时候 你心里突然就确定了

translation.en: -Stacy. -Derek.
translation.zh:
-我叫斯黛西
-我叫德里克

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Yeah, ditto.
translation.zh:
-很高兴认识你
-我也是

translation.en: I had met my life-mate. I was certain.
translation.zh: 我遇到了我的人生伴侣 我很确定

translation.en: Yeah! Yes!
translation.zh: 太棒了…

translation.en: -That's good. Yes? -The bar's closed.
translation.zh:
-很精彩 对吧？
-酒吧打烊了

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在搞什么？

translation.en: That first year of our relationship was amazing.
translation.zh: 我们恋爱的第一年 真是太幸福了

translation.en: We were in sync, inseparable...
translation.zh: 我们完全同步 无法分开

translation.en: ...and in love.
translation.zh: 深陷爱河

translation.en: And though I technically still lived with Mom...
translation.zh: 虽然严格来说 我还是跟我妈住一起

translation.en: ...I was spending practically all my time at Derek's.
translation.zh: 但我几乎整天都待在德里克家

translation.en: My life was going according to plan. Sort of.
translation.zh: 我的生活完全按计划在发展 算是吧

translation.en: -Derek! -Bob! Bob!
translation.zh:
-德里克…
-鲍勃…

translation.en: Professionally speaking, I was the go-to girl in a dead-end job.
translation.zh:
在职业方面 我是个跑腿打杂的
干着没有前途的工作

translation.en: I mean, you can only work your way up for so long, right?
translation.zh: 努力向上爬 也只能到这里了 对吧？

translation.en: It was time to move on.
translation.zh: （WWEN电视台） 该向前看了

translation.en: And while Diane Sawyer was still out of reach...
translation.zh: 尽管黛安索耶依然是遥不可及的

translation.en: ...television personality Kippie Kann wasn't.
translation.zh: 但电视人物凯皮卡安并不是

translation.en: The grande dame of daytime talk needed an associate producer. Me.
translation.zh:
这位日间脱口秀女王
需要个副制片人 就是我

translation.en: It was a match made in Trenton.
translation.zh: 我们的结合发生在特伦顿

translation.en: -Which brings us up to speed. -Ira Nachlis. Follow.
translation.zh:
-故事差不多就从这里开始
-我是埃拉纳克里斯 跟上

translation.en: The beginning of the end. Day one.
translation.zh: 不幸的开始 第一天

translation.en: Tight on space, but your desk is right next to....
translation.zh:
空间很狭小
不过你的办公桌紧挨着…

translation.en: -Barb. -Campbell-hyphen-Dunn.
translation.zh:
-芭布
-坎贝尔邓恩

translation.en: Meet our new associate producer, Stacy Hoyt.
translation.zh:
来认识下新来的副制片人
斯黛西霍伊特

translation.en: -Holt. -Whatever.
translation.zh:
-是霍特
-随便吧

translation.en: Put your stuff down. I'll take you to the taping.
translation.zh: 把你的东西放下 我带你去片场

translation.en: We got pictures of strippers he's been with.
translation.zh:
我们搞到了
他跟好几个脱衣舞女在一起的照片

translation.en: Cheating bastard.
translation.zh: 出轨的混蛋

translation.en: They call it "fluffing." Prepping the guests.
translation.zh:
他们称之为“煽风点火”
让嘉宾做准备

translation.en: We got proof. Go on, now. Be strong. And violent.
translation.zh:
我们有证据 出击吧
强势点 暴力点

translation.en: By the time they're on, they're ready to go nine rounds.
translation.zh:
等他们上台的时候
都可以打第九回合了 等着瞧

translation.en: So there's two shows today, 9 and 3.
translation.zh: 今天有两场节目 9点和3点

translation.en: Nine is "Cheating Bastards." My idea.
translation.zh: 9点是“出轨的混蛋”那是我的创意

translation.en: -I owe you one, Bea. -Oh, no problem.
translation.zh:
-我欠你一个人情 比娅
-没事

translation.en: That's a great idea. Why aren't you producing?
translation.zh:
真是个好创意
你为什么不亲自制片呢？

translation.en: I am. Carl just takes credit.
translation.zh: 我就是啊 不过挂名的是卡尔

translation.en: Deep breath.
translation.zh: 深呼吸

translation.en: And showtime.
translation.zh: 好戏开始了

translation.en: Pathway, people!
translation.zh: 让路 各位

translation.en: I'm on my way! I'm on my way!
translation.zh: 我马上就来…

translation.en: Anybody have tickets for Thomas Oglestein?
translation.zh: 有人有汤玛斯奥格斯丁的演出票吗？

translation.en: I haven't proofed these yet. They look okay to you?
translation.zh:
我还没审查过这个
你觉得这看上去没问题吗？

translation.en: Did you use the words "dope," "dog" and "stripper"?
translation.zh:
你频繁使用了“笨蛋 狗 脱衣舞女”
这些词吗？

translation.en: -They're fine. -They're fine.
translation.zh: 那就没问题…

translation.en: Is it just me? I think the horse in Montana is missing his feedbag.
translation.zh:
天啊 只有我这么认为吗？我觉得
蒙大拿州的这匹马想念它的饲料袋了

translation.en: I just got word we're about ready to start. But before we do...
translation.zh:
我刚接到消息说就要开始了
但是在开始前…

translation.en: ...I want you to get to know each other. Turn to the person behind you...
translation.zh:
我希望大家能认识一下彼此
请各位跟自己身后的人…

translation.en: ...and shake hands. That would be great.
translation.zh: …握个手 真是好极了

translation.en: You guys are not that bright. We are really gonna start....
translation.zh:
你们可不怎么聪明
我们待会儿就开始…

translation.en: -I lost my scream. -What?
translation.zh:
-我找不到尖叫声了
-什么？

translation.en: -Got doorbell, buzzer, beating heart-- -No scream, no show!
translation.zh:
-门铃声 蜂鸣器声 心跳声都有
-没有尖叫声 就不成节目

translation.en: -Barb! -No scream, no show!
translation.zh:
-芭布
-没有尖叫声 就不成节目

translation.en: Go, Barb.
translation.zh: 开始吧 芭布

translation.en: Run title!
translation.zh: 播放片头

translation.en: Stand by, DP.
translation.zh: 准备好 摄影导演

translation.en: -Nice, Barb. -And cue applause.
translation.zh:
-好样的 芭布
-示意鼓掌

translation.en: -Standing by. -Stand by, Kippie.
translation.zh:
-准备好
-准备好 凯皮

translation.en: Go gray. And cue Kippie.
translation.zh: 灯光调暗 示意凯皮出场

translation.en: There she is!
translation.zh: 她出来了

translation.en: Hey, nice to see you.
translation.zh: 你好 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: She's getting ahead of you. Stand by, camera three.
translation.zh:
-她要走到你前面了 三号机 准备
-三号摄像机准备

translation.en: -Camera three. -Carl, what are you looking at?
translation.zh:
-三号摄像机
-卡尔 你在看什么呢？

translation.en: Welcome to Kippie Kann Do!
translation.zh: 欢迎收看《凯皮卡安秀》

translation.en: Today we're putting the dogs to the ultimate test.
translation.zh:
今天我们要让无耻的男人们
接受终极考验

translation.en: -Is your man a cheating bastard? -No!
translation.zh:
-你家男人是个出轨的混蛋吗？
-不是

translation.en: Then he'll have to pass the Kippie Kann Lie Detector to prove it.
translation.zh:
那他必须通过凯皮卡安测谎仪
来证明自己

translation.en: -Phil, camera two. -Camera two ready.
translation.zh:
-菲尔 二号摄像机
-二号摄像机预备

translation.en: -Cue doorbell. -Full scream.
translation.zh:
-播放门铃声
-尖叫声

translation.en: Better get that.
translation.zh: 最好快去开门

translation.en: Yeah! Bring it on, sucker!
translation.zh: 好了 放马过来吧 烂人

translation.en: What up? What?
translation.zh: 还好吗？怎么了？

translation.en: -Cue apes. -Apes?
translation.zh:
-示意大猩猩出场
-大猩猩？

translation.en: Security.
translation.zh: 就是安保人员

translation.en: Yeah, represent!
translation.zh: 我就是代表

translation.en: What? What? What?
translation.zh: 搞什么…

translation.en: Rapper Boy Taye, why do you think you're here?
translation.zh:
说唱男孩塔伊
你今天为什么会来这里？

translation.en: I'm here because my woman's getting a hot hoochie-mama makeover.
translation.zh:
我来这里是因为
我的女人马上要来个性感大改造

translation.en: -Camera four. -I'd do her.
translation.zh:
-四号摄像机
-我负责拍她

translation.en: There is some kind of critter under the table.
translation.zh: 桌子底下有某种小动物

translation.en: It's either a rat....
translation.zh: 要么是老鼠…

translation.en: My sister saw you humping on a dirty-girl stripper.
translation.zh:
我姐姐看到你
跟一个下流的脱衣舞女上床

translation.en: Dirty-girl stripper?
translation.zh: 下流的脱衣舞女？

translation.en: You crazy! I never been with no stripper.
translation.zh:
你这个疯子
我才没跟脱衣舞女在一起过

translation.en: That ain't your grandma.
translation.zh: 那可不是你奶奶啊

translation.en: -That ain't me. -Liar!
translation.zh:
-那不是我
-骗子

translation.en: -You're stupider than you look. -No, you didn't!
translation.zh:
-你比你看上去还要蠢
-不 没有

translation.en: What are you, crazy?
translation.zh: 你是疯了吗？

translation.en: -You're a dirty dog! -Now let's not rush to judgment.
translation.zh:
-你这个下流的人渣
-先别急着下结论

translation.en: -Are you willing to prove it, Taye? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你愿意证明吗？塔伊
-我愿意

translation.en: -What do you say, audience? -Prove it! Prove it! Prove it!
translation.zh:
-观众们觉得怎么样？
-证明…

translation.en: I got nothing. Lori, what's up?
translation.zh:
我这边没有任何信息
劳丽 什么情况？

translation.en: -Another guest? -Do we have the right running order?
translation.zh:
-还有一位嘉宾？
-节目流程没错吧？

translation.en: -Should we have someone? -Who's up?
translation.zh:
-应该请什么人上场吗？
-谁上场啊？

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -I don't have this.
translation.zh:
-不好意思
-我这边没写

translation.en: Hello? Anyone there?
translation.zh: 喂 有人在那里吗？

translation.en: Oh, Jesus! Kippie's gonna--
translation.zh: 天啊 凯皮要…

translation.en: -There she blows. -Kippie can't keep covering, Carl!
translation.zh:
-她爆发了
-凯皮无法永远救场 卡尔

translation.en: -Good girl. -Is anybody in the booth...
translation.zh:
-好样的
-摄制棚里到底有没有人

translation.en: ...or is it just me down here by myself? I'm all alone down here!
translation.zh:
还是说就我一个人在这里？
我完全是孤立无援

translation.en: What are you guys doing? You're crazy!
translation.zh: 你们在干什么？你们疯了

translation.en: -Carl! -What was the problem, Phil?
translation.zh:
-卡尔
-出什么问题了？菲尔

translation.en: Oh, shoot, there it is! It's a big one!
translation.zh: 该死 在这儿呢 是个大老鼠

translation.en: Okay, people, lots to do. We got two shows today.
translation.zh:
好了 各位 有很多事要做
今天有两场节目

translation.en: First I wanna say hello to our new associate producer...
translation.zh:
但首先我想让大家
跟我们新来的副制片人打个招呼

translation.en: ...our little doorbell-ringer herself, Stacy Holt.
translation.zh: 也就是按门铃的人 斯黛西霍特

translation.en: -What's up, girl? -Just kidding, Stace. Just a little fun.
translation.zh:
-你好 姑娘
-开玩笑的 斯黛西

translation.en: Welcome to our little thing.
translation.zh: 欢迎加入我们的小节目

translation.en: Katie, you wanna show them the--?
translation.zh: 凯蒂 你能给大家看看那个…

translation.en: Take a look at our new look.
translation.zh: 来看看我们的新面貌吧

translation.en: -"Kippie Kann keeps competitors...." -He's bringing back the hard K's.
translation.zh:
-“凯皮卡安让各位竞争者…”
-他又开始使用全K字母开头的单词

translation.en: -Keep going, Katie. Keep it going. -It was her thing, like a trademark.
translation.zh:
-继续说 凯蒂…
-那是她的特色 就跟商标一样

translation.en: --"creatively while keeping keen"....
translation.zh: “保持创意 同时也保持真诚…”

translation.en: -But that was a million years ago. -Nostalgia, folks.
translation.zh:
-但那是很久前的事了
-怀旧啊 各位

translation.en: Hearkens back to a simpler time. They eat it up.
translation.zh:
倾听简单年代的声音
人们就吃这套

translation.en: Like when Captain Kangaroo was king and Casey Kasem was in kindergarten.
translation.zh:
比如袋鼠船长还在称王
凯西卡希姆还在上幼儿园的年代 有是K开头…

translation.en: -He's nuts. -Who invented reality?
translation.zh:
-他疯了
-谁发明了真人秀？

translation.en: -We did. -So keep those hard K's coming.
translation.zh:
-我们
-所以继续使用这些K开头的单词吧

translation.en: -Kipp, you should be in makeup, kiddo. -Cut the K's, Carl.
translation.zh:
-凯皮 你应该去化妆啊
-别用K了 卡尔

translation.en: -It's cute. It's Kippie. -It's crap! Capisce?
translation.zh:
-那很可爱 很有凯皮风范
-那简直是垃圾 明白吗？

translation.en: Here's the thing:
translation.zh: 问题是这样的

translation.en: That orchid on the desk? Well, I just got it.
translation.zh: 桌上的那盆兰花 我刚想到

translation.en: Which can only mean it's a new picture.
translation.zh: 那只能意味着 这是张新照片

translation.en: Let me see that.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: She's right. This cruelty cannot continue. Katie.
translation.zh:
她说得对 这种残忍的事
不能继续下去了 凯蒂

translation.en: -Carl. -If somebody has a problem with me...
translation.zh:
-卡尔
-如果有人对我有意见…

translation.en: -...just tell me straight up. Otherwise-- -You get canned. With a "C."
translation.zh:
-直接告诉我就行 否则…
-你就会被开除 是C字母开头的

translation.en: Kippie, to makeup.
translation.zh: 凯皮 去化妆吧

translation.en: -Good girl. -I told you.
translation.zh:
-真乖
-我跟你说过了

translation.en: I'll do my best to catch the culprit, Kippie.
translation.zh: 我会尽全力抓住罪魁祸首的 凯皮

translation.en: Thank you....
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Ira.
translation.zh: 我叫埃拉

translation.en: Nachlis.
translation.zh: 纳克里斯

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你

translation.en: I've worked here for three years.
translation.zh: 我在这里工作三年了

translation.en: Okay, people, need you focused right here!
translation.zh: 好了 各位 集中注意力听我说

translation.en: It's all about sweeps.
translation.zh: 最重要的就是电视季

translation.en: Give me drama, pathos, life unfolding.
translation.zh:
给我制造狗血剧情
感染力 真实的生活

translation.en: Make me cry. Ira.
translation.zh: 让我哭出来 埃拉

translation.en: Regurgitate something fresh.
translation.zh: 制造点新鲜感出来

translation.en: -"Midget Holiday Hell." -Stinks.
translation.zh:
-“侏儒地狱般的假日”
-烂死了

translation.en: -Come on. Give it to Daddy. -"Parents Who Party."
translation.zh:
-都来 让我见识下你们的才华
-我男友是女的 -“开派对的父母”
-他们跟谁开派对？

translation.en: -Who do they party with? -Rejecting the midgets?
translation.zh:
-“开派对的父母”
-他们跟谁开派对？ 放弃侏儒了吗？

translation.en: -Midgets. -What?
translation.zh:
-侏儒
-什么？

translation.en: Mixed parents. Happy mixed parents.
translation.zh: 混合的父母 幸福的混合父母

translation.en: -One normal size.... -One midget?
translation.zh:
-一个是正常体型…
-一个是侏儒？

translation.en: -Sexy. I like it. -Those midgets are mine!
translation.zh:
-性感 我喜欢
-侏儒是我提出来的

translation.en: You can't corner the midget market! Yours party during holidays.
translation.zh:
你不能垄断侏儒市场
再说了 你提出的只是在假日开派对

translation.en: -Mine party as a family. -Are they happy?
translation.zh:
-我提出的是作为一个家庭开派对
-他们是幸福的一家吗？

translation.en: -It'd make you cry. -Kippie is great with sentiment.
translation.zh:
-能让你感动得哭出来
-凯皮很擅长煽情

translation.en: -Give me that thing! -Don't! Don't touch me!
translation.zh:
-把那个还给我
-别 别碰我

translation.en: -He has no happy midgets! -Gentlemen, please!
translation.zh:
-他才没有什么幸福的侏儒
-先生们 够了

translation.en: We combine the segments. We share the credit and the midgets.
translation.zh:
把两者结合起来
一起做侏儒节目 功劳是大家的

translation.en: We work together here, people. We are a team.
translation.zh:
我们是共同合作的 各位
我们是个团队

translation.en: -"Grandma's a Hooker." -You got a grandma?
translation.zh:
-“奶奶是个妓女”
-你有奶奶？

translation.en: -Several. -Run the prep.
translation.zh:
-好几个呢
-开始做准备

translation.en: -"Penitentiary Porn." -"Little Black Books."
translation.zh:
-“监禁黄片”
-“小黑书”

translation.en: -Do not follow. -Electronic little black books.
translation.zh:
-我没听明白
-电子小黑书

translation.en: -As in? -As in Palms...
translation.zh:
-指的是？
-指的是掌上电话…

translation.en: ...BlackBerries, desk organizers. Electronic footprints...
translation.zh:
黑莓手机 文具手机盒
电子足迹里都会有…

translation.en: ...of where your man has been and with whom.
translation.zh:
你的男人去过哪里
跟谁在一起过的电子追踪器

translation.en: Under the right circumstances, they could be a girl's best friend.
translation.zh:
在恰当的情况下
它们可以是女孩最好的朋友

translation.en: Especially a scorned girlfriend, wife, mistress--
translation.zh:
尤其是一个被嫌弃的女朋友
妻子 情人…

translation.en: -I think it's a fantastic idea. -Thank you!
translation.zh:
-我觉得这主意超棒
-谢谢

translation.en: -Since our audience is 90% female-- -Sexy! Run the prep.
translation.zh:
-鉴于我们的观众90%都是女性
-性感 开始做准备

translation.en: Let's go! Come on.
translation.zh: 开始吧…

translation.en: -"Pregnant Strippers"! -"Black Midgets with Books"!
translation.zh:
-“怀孕的脱衣舞女”
-“看书的黑侏儒”

translation.en: -"Unnatural Animal Love." -"Literacy in Inner-City Schools."
translation.zh:
-“变态的动物恋”
-“内城区学校的读写能力”

translation.en: Shit! Take it back. Take it back.
translation.zh: 糟了 收回 我收回

translation.en: She was just kidding.
translation.zh: 她开玩笑的

translation.en: And I tried to pretend I was.
translation.zh: 我努力假装我真在开玩笑 （凯皮卡安之家）

translation.en: First the doorbell, then the staff meeting?
translation.zh:
先是按了门铃
然后又在员工会议上出丑？

translation.en: I am absolutely mortified.
translation.zh: 我真觉得特别尴尬

translation.en: Don't worry, no one will remember.
translation.zh: 别担心 没人会记得

translation.en: -You can ring my bell -Hey, stop it!
translation.zh:
-你可以按响我家门铃
-闭嘴

translation.en: -Ring my bell -She's really upset.
translation.zh:
-按响我家门铃
-她已经很难过了

translation.en: Oh, please. I'm the only victim here.
translation.zh: 拜托 我才是唯一的受害者

translation.en: Why should I be forced to share credit with--?
translation.zh: 我为什么要被迫跟那家伙分享功劳？

translation.en: -Not fair. -Your midget idea was tired.
translation.zh:
-不公平
-你那个侏儒创意很老旧

translation.en: -His twist made it different. -Thanks, I feel so much better.
translation.zh:
-他的创意赋予了它新意
-谢了啊 我感觉好受多了

translation.en: If you make sweeps even with shared credit, that's a huge deal.
translation.zh:
就算是两个人的功劳
取得超高收视率 那也很了不起

translation.en: I happen to know that the people from Harpo, Oprah's group...
translation.zh:
我恰好知道哈珀制片公司的那些人
就是奥普拉的团队

translation.en: ...TiVo every one of our shows.
translation.zh: 会录制我们的每一期节目

translation.en: For what it's worth, I really like your "Little Black Book" idea.
translation.zh:
不管怎样 我真的很喜欢
“小黑书”这个创意

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah. So don't cry in my soup.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-是啊 所以别对着我自怨自艾

translation.en: -So how does it all work exactly? -You put your best shows in sweeps.
translation.zh:
-所以到底是怎么个做法？
-在电视季要奉上最棒的节目

translation.en: The most outrageous, the most provocative attention-grabbers.
translation.zh: 最出色的 最能吸引人注意的

translation.en: -Then they promo it. -It's about getting eyeballs...
translation.zh:
-然后重金宣传
-关键就在于吸引眼球

translation.en: ...to get numbers, to get revenue, to get renewed.
translation.zh: 赚取收视率 获得收益 然后被续订

translation.en: We're beginning sweeps now, so things are in the can.
translation.zh:
电视季节已经开始了
所以各种东西差不多已经准备好了

translation.en: -So, what was pitched today? -June sluts.
translation.zh:
-所以今天都推介了哪些创意？
-6月荡妇

translation.en: Slots. Of which we average nine a month.
translation.zh: 是档期 每个月平均有九次

translation.en: "We" being the drones. The APs. When an AP gets a slut-- Slot.
translation.zh:
我们副制片人就是工蜂
每次副制片人得到荡妇…档期

translation.en: It's like a credit. You need so many credits to advance.
translation.zh:
就上升个等级 就像是学分
需要很多学分才能晋级

translation.en: -And you have the most? -Catching on.
translation.zh:
-你拥有的最多吗？
-开始上道了

translation.en: He's next. The only way to jump ahead of him is if you land the live show.
translation.zh:
他是下一个 跳到他前面的唯一办法
就是你搞定一档直播节目

translation.en: -Please. -This month?
translation.zh:
-拜托
-这个月吗？

translation.en: -A week from Friday. -APs never get the live show.
translation.zh:
-下周五
-副制片人从来别想拿到直播节目

translation.en: -Karen Meskil. -Urban legend.
translation.zh:
-凯伦麦斯科尔就拿到了
-那是都市传奇

translation.en: Anyway, if you do, you're instantly promoted.
translation.zh: 总之 如果你搞定了 马上就能升职

translation.en: -Wow. -Hi, Barbara.
translation.zh: 你好 芭芭拉

translation.en: Hey, Kippie. Great show.
translation.zh: 你好 凯皮 节目太棒了

translation.en: Let's not go there. You must be Stacy.
translation.zh: 别提那个 你一定是斯黛西

translation.en: Wow. I am so unbelievably sorry about what happened.
translation.zh: 关于之前发生的事 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: Please. Let he who is without sin cast the first stone.
translation.zh:
别这样说
“人非圣贤 孰能无过”

translation.en: Hello again.
translation.zh: 又见面了 你好

translation.en: Ira.
translation.zh: 我叫埃拉

translation.en: -Nachlis. -Yes, you are.
translation.zh:
-纳克里斯
-是的 没错

translation.en: So sorry to hear about you and Neil. I thought he was a keeper.
translation.zh:
你和尼尔分手的事 我很遗憾
我还以为他是个可靠的人

translation.en: Kippie?
translation.zh: 凯皮？

translation.en: -Sorry. Excuse me. -Bye.
translation.zh:
-抱歉 失陪了
-再见

translation.en: -Who's Neil? -My boyfriend.
translation.zh:
-尼尔是谁？
-我男友

translation.en: Ex, actually.
translation.zh: 其实是前男友了

translation.en: "Hi, Barbara. How's Neil? You must be Stacy."
translation.zh:
“你好 芭芭拉 尼尔怎么样？
你一定是斯黛西”

translation.en: What's missing here? Oh, me!
translation.zh: 其中少了什么？少了我啊

translation.en: You're right. I should get as many shows on the air as possible. Be seen.
translation.zh:
你说得对 我应该尽可能多地
制作节目 让自己有存在感

translation.en: Noticed by somebody. Anybody.
translation.zh: 被某人注意到 随便什么人都行

translation.en: Okay, so, what I'm about to do should not be interpreted as groveling...
translation.zh:
好了 我接下来要做的事
不要被解读成卑躬屈膝

translation.en: ...hypocrisy, or desperation. It's merely a loss of personal integrity.
translation.zh:
虚伪或自暴自弃
而只是一种人格操守的缺失

translation.en: Excuse me. Larry, wait up!
translation.zh: 失陪了 莱瑞 等等

translation.en: -He's funny. -Yeah. Talented too.
translation.zh:
-他很幽默啊
-是啊 也很有才

translation.en: Okay, I'll do the midgets.
translation.zh: 好吧 我来负责侏儒策划案

translation.en: -Too bad he'll never make it here. -Why not?
translation.zh:
-真遗憾 他永远无法在这里成功
-为什么？

translation.en: He cares too much what everyone thinks. Especially Kippie.
translation.zh:
他太在乎别人的看法了
尤其是凯皮的看法

translation.en: -And that's bad because...? -They're shopping for a newer model.
translation.zh:
-那为什么不好？
-因为他们打算换人主持了

translation.en: -But she's the boss. -It's been in the works a long time.
translation.zh:
-但她是老大啊
-已经进行很久了

translation.en: Who do you think leaked the pictures to the tabloids?
translation.zh:
-你想谁把那些照片泄露给小报的？
-什么？

translation.en: Her ratings are down, and she's got five years left on her contract.
translation.zh:
她的节目收视率降下来了
但却还有五年的合同

translation.en: You do the math.
translation.zh: 你自己算算吧

translation.en: -So is it always like this? -I don't know.
translation.zh:
-所以这行业一直是这样吗？
-我也不知道

translation.en: I haven't been here long enough to say.
translation.zh:
我进入这行的时间也不够长
没资格评价

translation.en: -No, I thought you were-- -A lifer?
translation.zh:
-不 我以为你…
-干很久了吗？

translation.en: No. A year and a half ago I was on Wall Street.
translation.zh: 不 一年半以前 我还在华尔街工作

translation.en: And before that I drove a bus.
translation.zh: 在那之前 我是开公车的

translation.en: It's all pretty much the same.
translation.zh: 其实差不多都一样

translation.en: People will tell you who they are if you just listen.
translation.zh:
如果你认真倾听的话
人们会跟你说自己的故事

translation.en: You can figure them out. Sometimes you can help.
translation.zh:
你可以理解他们
有时候 你可以帮上忙

translation.en: -Let's help Kippie. -I should warn you.
translation.zh:
-我们来帮凯皮吧
-我得提醒你一下

translation.en: I'm uncomfortable with touching and sentiment.
translation.zh: 我不习惯被人触碰或太感性的对话

translation.en: -Sorry. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-抱歉
-谢谢

translation.en: It's all about the bottom line.
translation.zh: 关键就在于底线

translation.en: -In every business. -Does she know?
translation.zh:
-在每个行业都是这样
-她知道吗？

translation.en: She used to be prime-time out of New York.
translation.zh: 以前她的黄金档节目能覆盖到纽约

translation.en: Now she's syndicated in Jersey.
translation.zh: 现在只能在新泽西离网重播

translation.en: It's one thing to start here, but you don't climb your way to Trenton.
translation.zh:
从这里起步是一回事
但沦落到特伦顿是另一回事

translation.en: Nothing we can do, short of winning sweeps.
translation.zh:
除了在电视季胜出
我们没有任何办法

translation.en: -Well, then let's win sweeps. -Oh, okay.
translation.zh:
-那就胜出啊
-好吧

translation.en: -We could try. -Win one for the Kipper?
translation.zh:
-我们可以试试啊
-替凯皮赢得一次？ -对 拜托了
-这对我而言太热心了

translation.en: -Please. -This is too earnest for me.
translation.zh:
-对 拜托了
-这对我而言太热心了

translation.en: You've been teetering, and you just crossed over.
translation.zh: 你一直在试探 现在直接说出口了

translation.en: -Don't you like her? -I do, actually.
translation.zh:
-你不喜欢她吗？
-我其实挺喜欢的

translation.en: A lot. But that's irrelevant.
translation.zh: 很喜欢 但那与这无关

translation.en: That may be so, but does it reveal who your true friends are?
translation.zh:
或许是这样 但那显示了
你真正的朋友是谁吗？

translation.en: Are they keeping secrets?
translation.zh: 他们对你隐瞒了秘密吗？

translation.en: Well, it's not a secret anymore for someone...
translation.zh: 那对某人来说已经不是秘密了

translation.en: ...and we'll tell you why after these words.
translation.zh:
我们的片头过后
我们会为您解读原因

translation.en: Man, you should have seen what came out of this animal.
translation.zh: 你真该看看这家伙都拉了些什么出来

translation.en: I miss all the good stuff.
translation.zh: 我错过看好东西了

translation.en: -Think you're pretty cute, don't you? -Well, I'm no Bob.
translation.zh:
-你觉得自己很可爱 对吧？
-我可不是鲍勃

translation.en: You better apologize.
translation.zh: 你最好道歉

translation.en: I think you just insulted Bob.
translation.zh: 我觉得你刚刚侮辱了鲍勃

translation.en: -You insinuated ugliness. -I did not. I did not.
translation.zh:
-你暗讽它丑
-我没有…

translation.en: -Apologize. -Okay, okay! I'm sorry, Bob. I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-快道歉
-好吧 对不起 鲍勃

translation.en: -Wait. Where are you going? -I gotta finish packing. Two minutes.
translation.zh:
等等 你要去哪儿？ -我得去收拾完行李 两分钟就好
-好的

translation.en: Did I tell you about Nieuwendyk's cousin? MVP out of Detroit?
translation.zh:
我跟你提过纽文达克的表哥吗？
底特律最有价值的球员？

translation.en: Guess who he's seeing Friday morning. His request.
translation.zh:
猜猜他周五早上要见谁
他主动要求的

translation.en: Yeah, you told me. It's amazing.
translation.zh: 你跟我说了 真是太棒了

translation.en: Honey, this fast-forward thing isn't working.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 这个快进键不管用啊

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -What?
translation.zh:
-天啊
-怎么了？

translation.en: -Oh, it's the gas. -Oh, God!
translation.zh:
-它放屁了
-天啊

translation.en: -Bob, get down. Come here, boy. -Open a window. Honey....
translation.zh:
-鲍勃 下来 快点
-快开窗 亲爱的

translation.en: Yeah, plus Robbie Moore, out of Buffalo?
translation.zh: 再加上水牛城的罗比摩尔？

translation.en: These guys are, like, the top two recruits in the country.
translation.zh:
他们两个简直是全国
最值得招募的新球员

translation.en: And if I can nail them both....
translation.zh: 如果我能把他们两个都搞定…

translation.en: No ifs. You will. I know it.
translation.zh: 没有如果 你一定能成功 我确定

translation.en: -Oh, what is the matter with that Bob? -Burrito.
translation.zh:
-那个鲍勃是怎么了？
-墨西哥卷饼

translation.en: -Want me to take him out? -Later.
translation.zh:
-想让我把它弄出去吗？
-待会儿吧

translation.en: -I can do it right now. -No.
translation.zh:
-我可以现在就把它弄出去
-不用

translation.en: Positive?
translation.zh: 确定吗？

translation.en: Jesus wept! Bob!
translation.zh: 天啊 鲍勃

translation.en: No more hot sauce, all right?
translation.zh: 不能再吃辣酱了 好吗？

translation.en: -Why are you feeding him hot sauce? -I don't know.
translation.zh:
-你为什么要给它吃辣酱？
-我也不知道

translation.en: -What are you watching? -Oh, Kippie.
translation.zh:
-你在看什么呢？
-凯皮秀

translation.en: -I'm studying the format. -Tell us how bulimia...
translation.zh:
-我在研究节目形式
-跟我们说说贪食症…

translation.en: -...affected your relationships, Lulu. -I lost them all.
translation.zh:
-是如何影响到你的人际关系的 露露
-我失去了所有的关系

translation.en: My agent. My friends. My boyfriends.
translation.zh:
包括我的经纪人
我的朋友 我的男朋友们

translation.en: -Lulu? -Fritz.
translation.zh:
-露露？
-弗里茨

translation.en: -The supermodel. -I was so ashamed.
translation.zh:
-那个超模
-我觉得好羞耻

translation.en: I knew it.
translation.zh: 我就知道

translation.en: I knew she barfed.
translation.zh: 我就知道她催吐过

translation.en: -Oh, that documentary. -No, I mean I heard her.
translation.zh:
-那部纪录片中讲的啊
-不 我是说我听到了

translation.en: You heard Lulu Fritz barfing?
translation.zh: 你听到露露弗里茨呕吐了？

translation.en: Yeah, couple times. Nasty.
translation.zh: 是啊 好几次呢 真恶心

translation.en: You think I'm gonna need a sweater in Detroit? In May?
translation.zh:
你觉得我去底特律需要带毛衣吗？
都5月了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: You don't feel compelled to explain further?
translation.zh: 你不觉得应该更详细地解释下吗？

translation.en: We dated. A little. I told you that, didn't I?
translation.zh:
我们短暂恋爱过一段时间
我跟你说过 对吧？

translation.en: Let me think. No.
translation.zh: 让我想想 没有

translation.en: Thought I did. Are you gonna be cool staying here by yourself?
translation.zh:
-我以为我说过 你一个人没问题吧？
-没问题

translation.en: -You'll walk Bob? -Sure.
translation.zh:
-你会遛鲍勃吧？
-当然

translation.en: Don't let him walk you. Who's the boss?
translation.zh: 别让它遛你 谁才是老大？

translation.en: -Me. -Tell him that.
translation.zh:
-我
-告诉它这点

translation.en: -I'm the boss, Bob. -You hear that, Bob?
translation.zh:
-我才是老大 鲍勃
-你听到了吗？鲍勃

translation.en: -You never mentioned her. -Who?
translation.zh:
-你从没提过她
-谁？

translation.en: Lulu.
translation.zh: 露露

translation.en: Because we don't sit around talking about past relationships.
translation.zh:
大概是因为我们从没坐下
好好交代过去的恋情吧

translation.en: She was a relationship.
translation.zh: 她曾是你的正经女朋友啊

translation.en: -Come on, Stace. -Yeah, we do.
translation.zh:
-拜托 斯黛西
-我们谈过的

translation.en: You told me about that med student you dated right before me.
translation.zh:
你跟我说过 在遇到我之前
跟你恋爱过的那个医学院学生

translation.en: And then the girl before that. What's her name? Joyce.
translation.zh:
以前更早前的那个
叫什么来着？乔伊丝

translation.en: -I guess you just forgot to mention-- -This is why I hate talking about this.
translation.zh:
-我觉得你只是忘记提…
-拜托 这就是为什么我讨厌谈这事

translation.en: It's just, you end up fighting over old ghosts.
translation.zh:
结果是你不断拿自己
跟我的前女友们比

translation.en: It's history. It's over. The past is past.
translation.zh:
都已经成历史了 早结束了
过去的事就让它过去

translation.en: That's before the past was a supermodel that barfed quietly.
translation.zh:
那是在我知道你的前女友
是个悄悄呕吐的超模前

translation.en: You know, I don't pry into your old boyfriends.
translation.zh: 我可没打探你的前男友们

translation.en: Here's a little tip: I never dated Brad Pitt.
translation.zh:
给你个提示
我从未跟布拉德皮特恋爱过

translation.en: All right. Shut it off, okay?
translation.zh: 好了 把电视关了 好吗？

translation.en: Look, I've had really bad experiences...
translation.zh: 听着 我以前谈论前女友时

translation.en: ...talking about past relationships, no matter how casual.
translation.zh:
曾闹得大家都不愉快
不管我们聊得多随意都是

translation.en: If you have to know, we had problems in bed.
translation.zh:
如果你非要知道的话
我们在床上有点问题

translation.en: Hallelujah
translation.zh: 哈利路亚

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
translation.zh:
-好吗？
-好吧

translation.en: -Bob hates it when we fight. -We're not fighting.
translation.zh:
-并且鲍勃讨厌我们吵架
-我们没有吵架

translation.en: -Tell him. -We are not fighting, Bob.
translation.zh:
-告诉它
-我们没在吵架 鲍勃

translation.en: So no more Lulu Fritz?
translation.zh: 所以不提露露弗里茨了？

translation.en: I will never mention the name "Lulu Fritz" again.
translation.zh: 我绝不会再提起露露弗里茨这个名字

translation.en: -Lulu Fritz. -No.
translation.zh:
-露露弗里茨
-不是吧

translation.en: -And he never told you? -The past is past.
translation.zh:
-他从没告诉过你吗？
-过去的已经过去了

translation.en: -"Unnatural Animal Love" in five. -Tell me you're not quoting him.
translation.zh:
-五分钟后开始录“变态的动物恋”
-告诉我你不是在引用他的话

translation.en: We made an agreement not to discuss old relationships.
translation.zh:
我们达成了一个协议
不再谈论旧恋情

translation.en: -Renegotiate. -No.
translation.zh:
-重新谈判
-不行

translation.en: Those who do not learn from his history are condemned to repeat it.
translation.zh: 不吸取历史教训的人必将重蹈覆辙

translation.en: Doesn't matter who he dated. What matters is why he stopped.
translation.zh:
他跟谁恋爱过甚至根本不重要
重要的是分手原因

translation.en: -What's he do? -He works for the Devils.
translation.zh:
-他是干什么的？
-他替魔鬼队效力

translation.en: -Who doesn't? Kidding. -Think about it hypothetically.
translation.zh:
-谁不啊？开玩笑的
-假设一下

translation.en: Say Derek's like Neil. Hypothetically.
translation.zh: 假设德里克是尼尔 假设而已

translation.en: How do you find out before you're too far gone? He won't say:
translation.zh:
你要如何在交往更深前查出真相？
他可不会说：

translation.en: "I was screwing my way through the phone book."
translation.zh:
“我们分手是因为
我按照电话簿到处跟人乱搞”

translation.en: -"And I only got to K." -He'll say:
translation.zh:
-“只搞名字为K开头的女人”
-他只会说：

translation.en: -"The past is past." -Right.
translation.zh:
-“过去的已经过去了”
-没错

translation.en: -Your man's hiding something. -What about his family?
translation.zh:
-你的男人有所隐瞒
-他的家人呢？

translation.en: -Good point. They'll always give dirt. -No, that's not what I mean.
translation.zh:
-他们总能透露一些肮脏的秘密
-不 我不是那个意思

translation.en: What are they like? You can tell a lot by studying where he came from.
translation.zh:
他们是什么样的人？通过研究
他的家庭出身 能知道很多东西

translation.en: I haven't met them.
translation.zh: 我还没见过他们

translation.en: He doesn't bring girls home.
translation.zh: 他不会把女孩带回家

translation.en: -He just doesn't. -Can I ask...
translation.zh:
-他从来就不会
-我能不能问问

translation.en: ...you ever think of appealing this decision? Meeting the folks?
translation.zh: 你想过争取一下吗？见家长？

translation.en: I don't wanna make him feel uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 我不想让他觉得不自在

translation.en: Yeah. Let's not do that. That'd be bad.
translation.zh: 好啊 那就别那么做 那可真不好

translation.en: -Stop it! -What century are you in?
translation.zh:
-别冷嘲热讽了
-你到底活在哪个世纪啊？

translation.en: You have a right-- Nay, an obligation to find out more.
translation.zh:
你有权利…不对
你有义务探索更多

translation.en: He's away for, what, two weeks? Take that time, I beg you.
translation.zh:
他要出差两周 是吧？
抓紧这段时间 我求你了

translation.en: Learn a few things. Anything. Information's power.
translation.zh:
查到一些事 任何事都行
信息就是力量啊

translation.en: -Feels dishonest. -That's because it is.
translation.zh:
-觉得很不正当
-因为确实如此

translation.en: You wanna keep your man, you find out why they didn't.
translation.zh:
你想留住你男人
就得搞清楚她们为什么没留住

translation.en: -I thought you stopped. -I have.
translation.zh:
-我以为你戒烟了呢
-我是戒了

translation.en: Look, I agree. There's better ways to do it.
translation.zh:
听着 我也同意
有更好的方法去做这事

translation.en: -It'd be great if you could ask him-- -Or the folks.
translation.zh:
-如果你能问他自然是最好
-或是问他父母

translation.en: Since no one argues with the lord and master, you gotta get creative.
translation.zh:
鉴于没人会跟男友直接争吵
你一定要有创意才行

translation.en: All men should come with letters of recommendation, or warning labels.
translation.zh:
首先我觉得所有男人都该自带推荐信
或是警告标示

translation.en: Or little black books. Does he have one?
translation.zh: 或是小黑书 他有吗？

translation.en: -A Palm. Why? -She may be hopeless.
translation.zh:
-他有掌上电话 怎么了？
-她可能没救了

translation.en: -She's not hopeless. -Okay, then open it up. Explore.
translation.zh:
-她才不是没救了
-好啊 那就敞开来说 探索下

translation.en: Speaking of which, what was Lulu's last name?
translation.zh: 说到这个 露露姓什么？

translation.en: Fritz. Why?
translation.zh:
-弗里茨 怎么了？
-那是什么？

translation.en: -What's that? -Vintage. Working Girl, 1988.
translation.zh: 老古董 1988年的《上班女郎》

translation.en: -Good movie? -It's a great movie.
translation.zh:
-是部好电影？
-是部非常出色的电影

translation.en: You've never seen it?
translation.zh: 你没看过吗？

translation.en: Staten Island girl trying to make her way in the big city...
translation.zh:
史坦顿岛的女孩 想依靠自己
在大城市闯出一片天地

translation.en: -...on her own terms. -Melanie Griffith, huh?
translation.zh:
史坦顿岛的女孩 想依靠自己
在大城市闯出一片天地 -梅兰妮格里菲斯演的？
-是啊

translation.en: -Yeah. -Has she never heard of call waiting?
translation.zh:
-梅兰妮格里菲斯演的？
-是啊 她从没听说过呼叫等待功能吗？

translation.en: And Mike Nichols. He's famous.
translation.zh: 以及麦克尼古拉斯 他很出名

translation.en: He's a genius.
translation.zh: 他是个天才

translation.en: Plus, he's married to Diane Sawyer.
translation.zh: 并且 他还是黛安索耶的丈夫

translation.en: -Who you wanna be. -Ringing!
translation.zh:
-她就是你想成为的人
-响了

translation.en: Ladies.
translation.zh: 女士们 （上班女郎）

translation.en: I don't wanna be her, Barb. I wanna work with her.
translation.zh:
我不想成为她 芭芭拉
我只想与她共事

translation.en: I will work with her. I believe I will.
translation.zh: 我将来会与她共事 我相信会的

translation.en: -I believe you will too. -Hello, Lulu Fritz?
translation.zh:
-我也相信你会的
-喂 请问是露露弗里茨吗？

translation.en: Ira Nachlis. Senior associate producer/producer, Kippie Kann Do.
translation.zh:
我是埃拉纳克里斯 《凯皮卡安秀》
节目的高级副制片人兼制片人

translation.en: Listen, "I Model, Then I Barf Quietly"...
translation.zh: 听着 “我当超模 然后悄悄呕吐”

translation.en: -...is one of our highest-rated shows. -What are you doing?
translation.zh:
-是我们收视率最高的节目之一
-你在干什么？

translation.en: I am trying to give a young innocent her 15 minutes of fame. Now--
translation.zh:
听着 我想给年轻单纯的她
15分钟的当名人的感觉 继续…

translation.en: I'm sorry. Lulu...
translation.zh: 不好意思 露露

translation.en: ...we're thinking of having a special next month.
translation.zh: 我们打算下个月做一期特别节目

translation.en: We'd like you to come in tomorrow for an interview.
translation.zh: 我们希望你明天过来做个采访

translation.en: Excellent. We'll do lunch and throw up-- Catch up.
translation.zh:
好极了 我们先吃个午餐
然后吐一下 不对 是聊一下

translation.en: I would love to expose myself to your viewers.
translation.zh: 我愿意将自己暴露在你们的观众面前

translation.en: Okay. Not going there.
translation.zh: 好吧 不是那方面

translation.en: So how did the documentary affect your personal life, Lulu?
translation.zh:
那部纪录片对你的私生活
产生了什么影响？露露

translation.en: Well, it forced Stephen, my ex, to face his truth.
translation.zh: 它迫使我前男友斯特夫面对事实

translation.en: He barfed too.
translation.zh: 他也会吐

translation.en: Fascinating. And before Stephen?
translation.zh: 好极了 那在斯特夫之前呢？

translation.en: I didn't date much. I was shy.
translation.zh: 我没交过几个男朋友 我以前很害羞

translation.en: And ugly.
translation.zh: 也很丑

translation.en: Why do supermodels say how ugly they were when they were young?
translation.zh:
为什么每个超模都喜欢说
自己年轻的时候很丑？

translation.en: Is it because they want us to know they suffered?
translation.zh:
是因为她们想让我们知道
她们受了很多苦吗？

translation.en: Do they think that it makes them more deserving?
translation.zh:
她们觉得那让她们
更值得享受现在的成功吗？

translation.en: That we'll forgive them their bounty? Note to supermodels:
translation.zh:
让我们原谅她们获得的高收益？
给各位超模一句忠告：

translation.en: None of us believe you.
translation.zh: 我们根本不信你们说的话

translation.en: -No one invited me to the prom. -Makes you stronger.
translation.zh:
-甚至没人邀请我参加毕业舞会
-那让你更坚强了

translation.en: So the only relationship you ever had ever was Stephen?
translation.zh:
所以你唯一的一段恋情
就是跟斯特夫吗？

translation.en: No. I mean, I dated a few people.
translation.zh: 不是 我的确跟几个人恋爱过

translation.en: -Names, please. -Fabrizio. Renato.
translation.zh:
-说出姓名
-法布里茨奥 雷纳尔多

translation.en: Carmine. Jahni.
translation.zh: 卡尔马恩 加尼

translation.en: -Derek. -She said his name.
translation.zh:
-德瑞克
-她说出了他的名字

translation.en: Derek.
translation.zh: 德瑞克

translation.en: His name came out of that mouth.
translation.zh: 他的名字从那张嘴里蹦了出来

translation.en: Derek. Derek.
translation.zh: 德瑞克…

translation.en: Her "Derek" was my Derek.
translation.zh: 她口中的德瑞克就是我的德里克

translation.en: -But mostly I was lonely. -How sad.
translation.zh:
-但大多时候我都是孤单一人
-真悲伤

translation.en: -Tell me about one of the early guys. -Oh, say, Derek.
translation.zh:
-说说你早期交过的男朋友吧
-比如 德里克

translation.en: -Derek? -It was just a casual kind of thing.
translation.zh:
-德瑞克？
-就是随便玩玩的而已

translation.en: -Stace, let her tell the story. -I am. She is. Go ahead.
translation.zh:
-斯黛西 让她来讲
-我没阻止她 说吧

translation.en: I was so young. I can hardly remember.
translation.zh: 我当时太年轻了 都不太记得了

translation.en: -Happens to all of us. -It was all superficial.
translation.zh:
-大家都这样
-只是肤浅的一段感情而已

translation.en: -What isn't these days? -Completely about sex.
translation.zh:
-这年头什么不肤浅？
-完全是为了性爱

translation.en: -Completely about-- What? -Sex.
translation.zh:
-完全是为了…什么？
-性爱

translation.en: -Sex. -Sex.
translation.zh: 性爱…

translation.en: -But you had problems in bed? -You don't know that.
translation.zh:
-但你们在床上有问题？
-埃拉 你并不知道这一点

translation.en: Guessing! Someone needs to chill.
translation.zh: 我猜的而已 某人需要冷静点

translation.en: Actually, the bedroom...
translation.zh: 实际上 卧室…

translation.en: ...was the only place we really connected.
translation.zh: 是我们唯一能心灵相通的地方

translation.en: Two, sometimes three times a day.
translation.zh: 一天做两三次

translation.en: Funny how your memory just snapped back like that.
translation.zh: 真有意思 你突然全都记起来了呢

translation.en: Anyways, Derek and I didn't talk much. I just used him for--
translation.zh:
实际上 德瑞克和我交谈不多
我只是利用他来…

translation.en: -We know. -Pretty amazing.
translation.zh:
-我们都知道
-真是太爽了

translation.en: Experimental. Wild.
translation.zh: 前所未有的 狂野

translation.en: -Sounds great. Why'd you split? -Oh, same old, same old.
translation.zh:
-听上去很棒啊 你们为什么会分手？
-都是老一套的原因

translation.en: Schedules. Travel. Temptation.
translation.zh:
时间排不过来 整天出差
面对其他诱惑

translation.en: -He cheated. -No! I did. All the time.
translation.zh:
-他出轨了
-不 是我出轨了 经常这样

translation.en: But he stuck around like a lovesick puppy.
translation.zh: 但他像个忠犬一样赖在我身边

translation.en: Finally, I asked him to go back to his old girlfriend.
translation.zh: 最后 我叫他跟他前女友复合

translation.en: She called all the time, begging him, pleading.
translation.zh: 她经常打电话给他 求他复合

translation.en: -She was desperate. -Joyce?
translation.zh:
-她当时为爱抛弃自尊
-乔伊丝？

translation.en: -How'd you know her name? -You mentioned it. She mentioned it.
translation.zh:
-你怎么知道她的名字？
-你提到的 她刚刚提到了

translation.en: -You did. -I did?
translation.zh:
-你的确提到了
-有吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Well, Joyce.
translation.zh: 对 乔伊丝

translation.en: He only went back to her out of pity.
translation.zh: 他完全是因为可怜她才跟她复合的

translation.en: I wonder what he's doing now.
translation.zh: 不知道他现在过得怎么样了

translation.en: Hey, Derek. This is Lulu!
translation.zh: 你好 德瑞克 我是露露

translation.en: Just thought I'd give you a call and let you know I was in town.
translation.zh:
就是觉得该给你打个电话
告诉你我现在在城里

translation.en: Cow. Quietly barfing cow.
translation.zh: 母牛 悄悄呕吐的母牛

translation.en: And suddenly, my certain world didn't seem so certain after all.
translation.zh:
突然间 我很确定的小世界
似乎也不那么确定了

translation.en: Hi, Bob. Are you hungry? I'm not hungry.
translation.zh: 鲍勃 你饿了吗？我可不饿

translation.en: Lulu dangled before me like bait on a wire.
translation.zh: 露露像一根鱼饵钩在我面前晃荡

translation.en: I swallowed it whole...
translation.zh: 我整个吞下去了

translation.en: ...and then wanted more.
translation.zh: 然后还想要更多

translation.en: It was time for the past to meet the present.
translation.zh: 是时候让过去与现在相遇了

translation.en: Bob, look. A box.
translation.zh: 鲍勃 快看 有个盒子

translation.en: I just need to clean up some stuff.
translation.zh: 我就是需要打扫下卫生而已

translation.en: He told me to.
translation.zh: 是他叫我打扫的

translation.en: Just checking things out, you know?
translation.zh: 就是看一些东西

translation.en: Oh, look. Pictures.
translation.zh: 瞧啊 是照片

translation.en: So this is hysterical Joyce.
translation.zh: 所以这就是歇斯底里的乔伊丝

translation.en: You don't look so desperate.
translation.zh: 你看上去并不像为爱抛弃尊严

translation.en: You look athletic.
translation.zh: 你看上去 很健美

translation.en: And pretty. Where was this taken?
translation.zh: 也很漂亮 这张照片是在哪里拍的？

translation.en: New York City Marathon. Okay.
translation.zh: 纽约城马拉松大赛 好吧

translation.en: Where you crossed the finish line.
translation.zh: 是在你跨越终点线后拍的

translation.en: And you were crying.
translation.zh: 并且你在哭

translation.en: And so was Derek while he hugs you.
translation.zh: 德里克抱着你的时候也在哭

translation.en: There's so many neat pictures, Bob.
translation.zh: 有好多好看的照片啊 鲍勃

translation.en: Rachel Keyes.
translation.zh: 瑞秋吉斯

translation.en: You are a podiatrist, I think?
translation.zh: 你好像是个足科医生吧？

translation.en: What's with that little minx-like smile?
translation.zh: 为什么笑得这么轻佻？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Can you just not look at me like that, please?
translation.zh: 你能不能别那样看着我？

translation.en: It's making me very uncomfortable.
translation.zh: 那让我感到很不舒服

translation.en: There. See? I'm done. Okay?
translation.zh: 好了 我不看了 好吗？

translation.en: And don't judge me. Okay, Bob?
translation.zh: 别评判我 好吗？鲍勃

translation.en: Hey, Stacy, it's me. You there?
translation.zh: 斯黛西 是我 你在吗？

translation.en: Okay, I guess you're out with Bob. Listen, I left my Palm at home.
translation.zh:
好吧 估计你跟鲍勃一起出去了
听着 我把电话丢在家了

translation.en: I need you to go through it and get me some numbers. Take care.
translation.zh:
我需要你翻看一下
帮我找几个号码 保重

translation.en: Palm?
translation.zh: 电话？

translation.en: Did you hear that, Bob? Derek left his Palm at home.
translation.zh:
你听到了吗？鲍勃
德里克把他的电话丢在家了

translation.en: Guess we'll have to look for it.
translation.zh: 看来我得找找了

translation.en: If I were a Palm, where would I be?
translation.zh: 如果我是个电话 我会在哪儿呢？

translation.en: If we were Palms, where would we be, Bob?
translation.zh:
如果我们是电话
我们会在哪儿呢？鲍勃

translation.en: Where is it?
translation.zh: 在哪儿呢？

translation.en: Where could it be right now?
translation.zh: 现在可能在哪儿呢？

translation.en: He asked for it.
translation.zh: 他叫我找的

translation.en: Where could it be?
translation.zh: 可能在哪儿呢？

translation.en: Luck is when preparation meets opportunity.
translation.zh:
幸运只不过
是有准备的人遇上了机遇而已

translation.en: Okay, Bob?
translation.zh: 明白吗？鲍勃

translation.en: Life's about certainty. It's about being in control.
translation.zh:
生活最重要的就是确定性
一切要在自己掌控之中

translation.en: Password, password, password. What would his password be?
translation.zh: 密码…他的密码会是什么呢？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Go to your bed.
translation.zh: 快上床睡觉去

translation.en: Go to your bed, Bob!
translation.zh: 上床睡觉去 鲍勃

translation.en: Seconds before opening the metallic case...
translation.zh: 在打开这个金属魔盒的几秒钟之前

translation.en: ...I envisioned all the evil flowing into the world.
translation.zh: 我想象着各种恶魔飞入这个世界

translation.en: I was Pandora.
translation.zh: 我就是潘多拉

translation.en: And then I got over it.
translation.zh: 然后我就克服了这种心理

translation.en: Look at that. Joyce works at the Kaleidoscope Kitchen.
translation.zh:
-看看这个 乔伊丝在万花筒厨房工作
-那又怎样？

translation.en: Brand-new place. Know what that means?
translation.zh:
全新的地方
你知道那意味着什么吗？

translation.en: It's a new entry. That place has only been open two, three months.
translation.zh:
那一条是新录入的
那地方才开始营业两三个月

translation.en: How would he know that unless they still talk?
translation.zh:
除非他们还在保持联系
否则他怎么知道这个？

translation.en: -That's ridiculous. -Ladies.
translation.zh:
-那也太荒唐了
-女士们

translation.en: Hey! We could give her a little jingle.
translation.zh: 不如这样 给她打个电话吧

translation.en: -"Hello, Joyce... -Where's Leo? Where's Leo?
translation.zh:
-“你好 乔伊丝…”
-利奥在哪儿…

translation.en: ...Moore? We're doing research on an upcoming episode...
translation.zh:
“摩尔？我们在接下来的一集中
要做个调查

translation.en: ...'Best Chefs in the Tri-State Area.'
translation.zh: 主题是三州地区最棒的大厨

translation.en: No guarantees, of course, but I was wondering if we could...
translation.zh:
-当然不能保证 不过我们能不能…
-不

translation.en: ...spend a little time...
translation.zh: 花点时间

translation.en: -...getting to know each other better." -Not doing it.
translation.zh:
-更好地了解一下彼此”
-我不会那么做的

translation.en: Now, how about that doctor he dated? What was her name?
translation.zh:
跟他恋爱过的那个医生呢？
叫什么来着？

translation.en: -Barb. -You have to admit it's educational.
translation.zh:
-芭布
-你必须承认这很有教育意义

translation.en: Look what you learned with Lulu. He didn't cheat.
translation.zh:
-瞧瞧你从露露身上得知了什么
-什么？ 他没有出轨

translation.en: -I never thought he did. -He said they had problems in bed...
translation.zh:
-我从没认为他出轨过
-但他说他们在床上有问题

translation.en: ...and it turns out the problem was getting out.
translation.zh:
结果发现他们唯一的问题
就是太爽了不想下床

translation.en: Little lie. Harmless. Unless it's a pattern.
translation.zh:
算是个小谎言 没什么危害
除非已经形成习惯了

translation.en: -It's not a pattern. -How do you know?
translation.zh:
-并没有形成习惯
-你怎么知道？

translation.en: Say, hypothetically, you get a dog.
translation.zh: 假设你有一条狗

translation.en: -A what? -A dog, hypothetically.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-狗 假设而已

translation.en: And you find out his grandfather and father chased cars.
translation.zh: 你发现它的爷爷和爸爸都喜欢追车

translation.en: -Whose father? -The dog's. In fact...
translation.zh:
-谁的爷爷？
-狗的 实际上…

translation.en: ...all the males in his line, car-chasers.
translation.zh: 它所有的雄性祖辈 都喜欢追车

translation.en: Chances are he'll chase cars.
translation.zh: 有很大可能它也会追车

translation.en: Helpful information you can only get by doing research.
translation.zh:
你只有通过做调查
才能获得有用的信息

translation.en: You need to find out, is your man a car-chaser?
translation.zh:
你需要搞清楚
你的男人是个追车的吗？

translation.en: -No. -Are you sure?
translation.zh:
-不
-你确定吗？

translation.en: People are creatures of habit. Last one. Their behavior is patterned.
translation.zh:
人都是习惯性动物 最后一根了
他们的行为是有固定模式的

translation.en: After Neil slept with half of Newark, I found out he'd been doing it for years.
translation.zh:
尼尔跟纽瓦克大半女人都睡过之后
我才发现别人都知道他这样已经多年

translation.en: So keep yourself dumb and believe what he tells you, or.... Up to you.
translation.zh:
你可以继续装傻 相信他说的一切
或者…反正由你决定

translation.en: -God, I hate this. -I know.
translation.zh:
-天啊 我好讨厌这样
-我懂

translation.en: -I hate doubt. -You'll get over it.
translation.zh:
-我讨厌怀疑的感觉
-你会克服的

translation.en: Now, what was the name of that chiropractor?
translation.zh: 那个推拿师叫什么来着？

translation.en: Podiatrist. Dr. Rachel Keyes.
translation.zh: 是足科医生 瑞秋吉斯医生

translation.en: Barb?
translation.zh: 芭布？

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Look, make an appointment. That's all. See how you feel once you meet her.
translation.zh:
预约一下而已
等你见到她 再看看你是什么感觉

translation.en: If you don't do the whole Kippie spiel, at least your feet will be happy.
translation.zh:
如果不能当凯皮的节目素材
至少你的脚会很开心

translation.en: You wanna work with Diane Sawyer?
translation.zh: 你想跟黛安索耶共事吗？

translation.en: You gotta learn how to do research.
translation.zh: 你必须学会如何做调查

translation.en: In the field.
translation.zh: 实地调查

translation.en: Health and Wellness Women's Clinic. Hold, please.
translation.zh: 这里是健康女性诊所 请稍等

translation.en: Look under the hood before you purchase the car.
translation.zh: 在买车前 一定要仔细检查下车子

translation.en: Thank you for holding. Health and Wellness Women's Clinic.
translation.zh: 谢谢等待 这里是健康女性诊所

translation.en: Yes, I'd like to make an appointment with Dr. Keyes, please.
translation.zh: 你好 我想预约一下吉斯医生

translation.en: -She's booked through the month. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-她这个月的档期都被预约满了
-好的

translation.en: -No cancellations? -Oh, wait.
translation.zh:
-没人取消预约吗？
-等等

translation.en: We have one for Thursday morning. 8:45.
translation.zh: 周四早上8点45分空出来了

translation.en: -I'll take it. -Name?
translation.zh:
-我要了
-姓名？

translation.en: Barb Campbell-hyphen-Dunn.
translation.zh: 芭布坎贝尔邓恩

translation.en: And what is this regarding, please?
translation.zh: 请问是什么疾病？

translation.en: -Warts. Plantar warts. Hurt like hell. -See you Thursday.
translation.zh:
-疣 足底疣 疼死了
-那周四见

translation.en: Hey, don't let the chickens out!
translation.zh: 别把鸡放出来了啊

translation.en: I was strangely calm waiting to meet the woman Derek dated before me.
translation.zh:
在等着见德里克在我之前的女友时
我竟然很平静

translation.en: So calm, in fact, I never questioned the gown...
translation.zh:
太平静了 以至于我都没问
为什么让我穿长袍病服

translation.en: ...or the need for easy access.
translation.zh: （瑞秋吉斯医生 妇产科） 以及要坐上妇科检查椅

translation.en: -So when was your last period? -My what?
translation.zh:
-你上次月经是什么时候？
-我的什么？

translation.en: -Your menses. -I don't understand.
translation.zh:
-月经
-我不明白

translation.en: Okay, each month you might notice a change in your body--
translation.zh:
每个月 你可能都会注意到
你的身体会发生一种变化

translation.en: I understand what you mean.
translation.zh: 我明白你的意思

translation.en: I just don't know why you'd want to know--
translation.zh: 我只是不知道你为什么想知道…

translation.en: -Barbara Campbell? -Hyphen-Dunn.
translation.zh:
-芭芭拉坎贝尔吗？
-复姓邓恩

translation.en: -Yes. -I'm Dr. Keyes.
translation.zh:
-是的
-我是吉斯医生

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: 你好…

translation.en: So, what brings you in here today?
translation.zh: 你今天是为什么而来？

translation.en: -Warts. -Warts.
translation.zh: 疣子…

translation.en: -Really painful. -All the time?
translation.zh:
-真的很疼
-一直疼吗？

translation.en: Well, mostly when you step on them.
translation.zh: 主要是踩在上面的时候

translation.en: Heels, you know. Ouch.
translation.zh: 在脚跟处 真的很疼

translation.en: I have a bit of a shoe fetish. Stilettos.
translation.zh: 我有点痴迷于鞋 尤其是细高跟鞋

translation.en: I'm trying to stay away from them. It's my bad.
translation.zh: 我在努力不穿那种鞋 都是我的错

translation.en: Well, maybe you can be more specific as to where the warts are.
translation.zh: 或许你可以更具体地指出疣体的位置

translation.en: -You wanna use this mirror? -No, that's not necessary.
translation.zh:
-你想使用这个镜子吗？
-不用 没必要

translation.en: I'm very flexible. They're sort of deep down.
translation.zh:
我身体很柔软灵活
在很下面靠里面的位置

translation.en: Just look way deep down inside.
translation.zh: 你得往里面看才行

translation.en: You can't really see them unless you look inside.
translation.zh: 不往里面看可看不到

translation.en: Well, maybe not that way. Why don't you just relax, Barbara.
translation.zh:
或许还是别这样吧
你放松就好 芭芭拉

translation.en: -Okay. -That's a good girl. There you go.
translation.zh:
-好的
-就是这样 真乖

translation.en: Just going to put your feet in these stirrups.
translation.zh: 把脚放在这两个脚蹬上

translation.en: Stirrups?
translation.zh: 脚蹬？

translation.en: Gynecologist? Not a podiatrist? Ten-to-1 those aren't for the opera.
translation.zh:
妇科医生？不是足科医生？
那手套肯定不是用来作秀的

translation.en: -And we'll have a little look-see. -Look-see? Where?
translation.zh:
-我们来检查下
-检查？查哪里？

translation.en: Oops. Someone left their panties on.
translation.zh: 某人的内裤没脱啊

translation.en: -Oops. -Just....
translation.zh: 只要这样…

translation.en: There you go. Good girl.
translation.zh: 就是这样 真乖

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -Comfy? -Well, let's see.
translation.zh:
-舒服吗？
-来概述下情况

translation.en: I'm spread-eagle for my boyfriend's ex, who's about to go searching for warts.

我在我男友的前女友面前
呈大字型张开 她还要探进去找疣体

translation.en: Super. Thanks.
translation.zh: 好极了 谢谢

translation.en: Barbara, you know what they say, right?
translation.zh: 芭芭拉 你也知道人们常说的

translation.en: You can never be too rich, too thin, or too far down on the table.
translation.zh: 不能太富 太瘦 或是躺得太远

translation.en: So let's scooch you. There we go. Perfect.

translation.en: -I'm going to insert the speculum now. -Oh, good. Narration.
translation.zh:
-接下来我要插入阴道窥器
-很好 还带讲解

translation.en: You may feel a bit of pressure.
translation.zh: 你可能会感受到一点压力

translation.en: Would you take a look at that cervix, Nurse Kisilevsky?
translation.zh:
你能看看这个子宫颈吗？
凯拉斯基护士

translation.en: Textbook. I'm not the first person who's told you that, I'm sure.
translation.zh:
太标准了
我肯定不是第一个这样对你说的人

translation.en: Can't hear it enough.
translation.zh: 永远都听不够呢

translation.en: It was all too horrible. I had to avert my eyes.
translation.zh:
真是太可怕了
我不得不移开我的眼睛

translation.en: Which made me focus on a sight more horrific.
translation.zh:
那让我把精力
集中在了更可怕的画面上

translation.en: Midst what seemed like an unusual amount of Dr. Keyes' beauty shots...
translation.zh: 在吉斯医生超乎寻常的大量美照中间

translation.en: ...stood a picture that jumped out. Big. Dr. Rachel Keyes and Bob?
translation.zh:
有一张格外显眼
竟然是瑞秋吉斯医生和鲍勃的合照？

translation.en: Stinky Bob! Why would she have a picture with him unless he was hers?
translation.zh:
臭鲍勃 她怎么会有它的照片？
除非它曾经是她养的狗

translation.en: Worse, theirs. I needed to take control. Fast!
translation.zh:
或者更糟糕 是他们共同养的
我需要控制一下自己 速度要快

translation.en: Dr. Keyes, I work with the Kippie Kann show.
translation.zh:
吉斯医生
我在《凯皮卡安秀》节目组工作

translation.en: You would never be interested in being on television would you?
translation.zh: 你有没有兴趣上电视啊？

translation.en: Call me Rachel.
translation.zh: 叫我瑞秋就行

translation.en: I started the vitamin company about a year and a half ago. It's just taken off.
translation.zh:
我大约一年半前创办了这家
维他命公司 现在业务刚开始腾飞

translation.en: -Oh? And look. Your picture's on it. -I fought them on that.
translation.zh:
-瞧啊 上面还有你的照片呢
-我强烈抗争才被印上去

translation.en: Sure you did. So tell me, Rachel.
translation.zh: 肯定啊 告诉我 瑞秋

translation.en: What did you have to sacrifice to get here?
translation.zh: 你牺牲了什么 才有今天的成就？

translation.en: Relationships? Family? Pets?
translation.zh: 爱情？家人？宠物？

translation.en: I never wanted to settle in order to settle down.
translation.zh: 我从来就不想为了安定而安定下来

translation.en: -You know what I'm talking about. -Oh, yeah. Back to pets.
translation.zh:
-你明白我什么意思
-好吧 继续说宠物

translation.en: I noticed a picture of a dog in the examination room.
translation.zh:
我刚刚在检查室
注意到一张狗狗的照片

translation.en: -So happy-looking. -Bob.
translation.zh:
-看上去好开心
-那是鲍勃

translation.en: He's my ex's dog, but I raised him.
translation.zh:
他是我前男友的狗
但却一直是我在养

translation.en: -He was such a cuddler. -Your ex?
translation.zh:
-它好喜欢被人抱着
-你前男友吗？

translation.en: The dog. I could've lobbied to keep him when we split.
translation.zh:
那只狗 我们分手时
我本来可以坚持留下它的

translation.en: But med school by day, the book by night.
translation.zh:
但我白天要在医学院上课
晚上要写书

translation.en: -You wrote a book? -Here we go. Second printing.
translation.zh:
-你还写了本书？
-就是这本 第二次印刷了

translation.en: Take one. I'll just bill you for it. It's a play on words.
translation.zh:
拿一本吧 我会把费用加进去的
书名玩了个文字游戏

translation.en: "Keyes to Your Vagina."
translation.zh: 《阴道秘“吉”》

translation.en: Clever. Oh, and there's that picture again.
translation.zh: 真高明 又是这张照片呢

translation.en: -So anyways, Bob, is it? -Yeah, he's with Derek. My ex.
translation.zh:
-那只狗是叫鲍勃 对吗？
-是的 他跟我前男友德里克在一起

translation.en: But I have visitation rights.
translation.zh: 不过我有探视权

translation.en: -Oh, really? -Sure.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-当然了

translation.en: The photograph in the exam room was taken a few weeks ago at a picnic.
translation.zh:
检查室那张照片就是几周前
在一次野餐时拍的

translation.en: A picnic? A few weeks ago?
translation.zh: 野餐？几周前？

translation.en: He went on a picnic with this self-obsessed prodigy?
translation.zh: 他跟这个自恋的天才去野餐了？

translation.en: -My head was spinning. -Anyway, Barb. Good news.
translation.zh:
-我觉得头晕目眩
-总之 芭布 好消息

translation.en: Your warts have cleared up.
translation.zh: 你的疣体都已经被清除了

translation.en: That's good to know.
translation.zh: 真是件好事

translation.en: Welcome back to "Grandma's a Hooker, So Handle It."
translation.zh:
欢迎回到“奶奶是妓女 接受吧”
节目现场

translation.en: Tell me, Grandma, as a working girl....
translation.zh: 告诉我 奶奶 作为一个工作女郎…

translation.en: -Stand by, mystery guest. -Standing by.
translation.zh:
-神秘嘉宾准备上场
-准备

translation.en: I pull down about five grand a weekend.
translation.zh: 我每周末大概能挣到5000块

translation.en: Ten if I bring a friend.
translation.zh: 如果我带个朋友 能挣10000

translation.en: What do you say, Kippie?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？凯皮

translation.en: What? Me?
translation.zh: 什么？我吗？

translation.en: -Talent is in place and ready to go. -Hey. How'd it go?
translation.zh:
-才艺人员已准备好上场
-进展得怎么样？

translation.en: -I went to third base with his ex. -What?
translation.zh:
-我跟他前女友上了三垒
-什么？

translation.en: But my warts have cleared up. She was a gynecologist!
translation.zh:
但我的疣体被清除了
她是个妇科医生

translation.en: -Doorbell. -Gyne--
translation.zh:
-按门铃
-妇…

translation.en: -Mommy, no! -Oh, shut up!
translation.zh:
-妈妈 不要
-闭嘴吧

translation.en: Ira. Can you...?
translation.zh: 埃拉 你能不能…

translation.en: A gynecologist? Yikes.
translation.zh: 妇科医生？天啊

translation.en: "Yikes" does not even begin to describe what I experienced.
translation.zh: “天啊”二字完全无法形容我的经历

translation.en: -Here she is. Don't screw up. -Turkey sausage.
translation.zh:
-这是你的大好机会 别搞砸了
-火鸡蘸酱

translation.en: She's an absolute freak of nature. She's got to be, like, what, 26, 27?
translation.zh:
她绝对是个怪胎
她也就26或27岁左右

translation.en: She's publishing books. She's practicing medicine.
translation.zh: 她又出书 又当医生

translation.en: And there's like a zillion pictures of her in her office.
translation.zh: 而且她办公室里估计有上亿张照片

translation.en: -Just her. Alone. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-她的单人照？
-是啊

translation.en: And let's not forget the little vitamin company that's just taken off.
translation.zh:
另外别忘了 她还开了家维他命公司
业务刚刚开始腾飞

translation.en: -Look at the positive side. -Which is?
translation.zh:
-往积极的一面看
-是什么？

translation.en: He's attracted to extraordinary women. Beautiful. Talented.
translation.zh:
他容易被极其出色的女人吸引
漂亮 有才

translation.en: Which is why he's with you now.
translation.zh: 正因此 他现在才会跟你在一起

translation.en: The only salient information you need to know is, did he cheat?
translation.zh:
你唯一需要知道的重要信息是
他出轨了吗？

translation.en: What? No. She was more in love with herself.
translation.zh: 什么？没有 她更像是爱上她自己了

translation.en: -This is good news. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-这是好消息啊
-是啊

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: It's just that he saw her a few weeks ago.
translation.zh: 只是他几周前跟她见过面

translation.en: They picnicked, which is totally fine.
translation.zh: 他们一起野餐了 那倒也没什么

translation.en: He's completely free to picnic with whomever.
translation.zh: 他完全有自由跟任何人一起野餐

translation.en: -But why wouldn't he mention it? -Maybe....
translation.zh:
-但他为什么提都不提呢？
-或许…

translation.en: -He forgot? -Maybe.
translation.zh:
-他忘了？
-或许吧

translation.en: -Yeah. Okay. -Who put those damn K's...
translation.zh:
-好吧 行
-是谁把这些该死的K字母

translation.en: ...all over the cue cards?
translation.zh: 写进提示卡里的？

translation.en: Bob, slow down. You're rocking the Palm.
translation.zh: 鲍勃 慢点 你会震坏电话的

translation.en: -You are so busted. -What?
translation.zh:
-你被抓包了
-什么？

身长约80厘米 喜欢舔嘴唇 常放屁

-叛徒
-斯黛西？怎么了？

translation.en: On Malverne.

你觉得它有没有可能
在附近有个朋友？

translation.en: Dark-haired genius, about 5'4"?

translation.en: Stace, he's a dog. Okay?

translation.en: If you let him, he'll walk all over you.

translation.en: Wonder where he learned it. Oh! Honey, I'm sorry.

真不知道它是从哪学到这毛病的
亲爱的 抱歉

translation.en: I've gotta go. Okay, call you from a hard line.

translation.en: -Excuse me! -Sorry.

-借过
-抱歉

translation.en: -Hello? -Who is it?

-喂？
-是谁？

translation.en: -Hello? -Who's there?
translation.zh:
-喂？
-是谁？

translation.en: Hello? Bob?

translation.en: -Bob? -Oh, come on, man.

-鲍勃？
-拜托 不是吧

translation.en: -You recognize his bark? -Stay! Sit.

-你竟然能听出它的叫声？
-别动 坐下

translation.en: -And he did. -I'm coming down.

-我马上下来

translation.en: Bob, come on.

translation.en: Come on. Down here. Down here.

translation.en: I need you to be very, very quiet.

translation.en: Bob?
translation.zh: 鲍勃？

我蹲在那里 捂着一只狗的口鼻
它心里喜欢的却是另一个女人

translation.en: ...I sadly realized I had reached an all-time low.

我可悲地意识到
我真的沦落到有史以来最卑贱的位置

translation.en: What are you doing out there?

translation.en: Where's your daddy? Let's go call Daddy. Come on, little pumpkin head.

你爸爸呢？
我们来给你爸爸打个电话 小甜心

我穿着名牌鞋就跑过来了
它在哪儿？

translation.en: In there. With her.

translation.en: Number two.

translation.en: -Yes? -Hi, it's Stacy Holt.

-什么事？

translation.en: -Don't use my name! -Holtenfrau. The dog-walker.

translation.en: -Bob! -Come on up. Number two.

-鲍勃
-上来吧 2号房

translation.zh: 她家里也全是她的照片吗？

translation.en: -She was very nice. -Thanks. That makes me feel better.

-她人很好啊
-谢了啊 那让我感觉好多了

translation.en: -It's vibrating. -Really?

-它在振动
-是吗？

translation.en: What are you doing?

translation.en: -Give me a few minutes. -Oh, stop that.

-给我几分钟
-别那样啊

translation.en: This little guy could make me very happy.

translation.en: Now you're officially scaring me.

translation.en: -If it turns into a pizza, I'm getting one. -Take that thing out of your pants.

-如果它变成了一个披萨 我要吃一个
-快把那东西从你裤子里拿出来

translation.en: -All over. -What?

-全身都有
-什么？

translation.en: And she's not self-conscious.
translation.zh: 并且她根本都不自知

translation.en: So many women hide their bodies these days, but not her.

现在很多女人都把身体遮盖起来
但她却不

translation.en: -How did you get that? -You know...

-你怎么看到这张照片的？
-就是…

translation.en: ...that little camera thing came on against my--

translation.en: And she-- You know, there she is. Jackpot.
translation.zh: 然后她就…出来了 算是中大奖了

-看那个小箭头 我应该按吗？
-不要

-好吧 按吧

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -There's so many.

-天啊
-有好多照片啊

translation.en: I'm not doing this. I can't. It's like going through someone's drawers.

我不看了 我做不到
就跟翻别人的抽屉一样

斯黛西 你会在你男朋友的父母面前
穿丁字裤吗？

translation.en: -Repeatedly? -My boyfriend's parents?

-一次又一次？
-我男朋友的父母？

translation.en: "Mom, Dad, Joyce. Hawaii, '99"?

妈妈 爸爸 乔伊丝
夏威夷 1999年

translation.en: Oh, look. Christmas, '98. They went to Aspen.

看啊 1998年圣诞节
他们去了阿斯彭

translation.en: I can't believe this.

translation.en: He could have a sister named Joyce, who he French kisses.

可能乔伊丝是他妹妹
不过他们竟然法式舌吻了

translation.en: And licks.

translation.en: Dare you to press the next arrow.

-该死的
-有多糟糕？

translation.en: -Shit! -Pornographic?

-该死的
-是艳照吗？

translation.en: It's out of power.

translation.en: -Where are we going? -Gonna put this baby in a cradle.

我们要去哪儿？ -去给这家伙充电
-好的

translation.en: -Come on. -Okay.

-快走
-好的

translation.en: Hurry up, Bob!

translation.en: I'll be right back.

translation.en: All systems go!

translation.en: Okay!

translation.en: I know.

translation.en: Because you can.

translation.en: Would I like to sync? Kinky.

translation.en: Entertainment. Absolument.

translation.en: Here's the thing-- No.

translation.en: -No. You'll thank me. -I know.

-别抽 你会感谢我的
-我懂

translation.en: Jesus.

translation.en: Wow. Presenting Joyce Moore and her cheesy music.

translation.en: Make it stop. Barbara....

translation.en: -Trying. Trying. -Please make it stop.

-我试试…
-快停下 （妈妈 爸爸 乔伊丝
夏威夷 1999年）

translation.en: -Hey, if you can do better.... -Later.

-如果你能做得更好…

对于你不知道的事
你有权要别人做出解释吗？

translation.en: I mean, hypothetically, you are in this great relationship with Neil.

translation.en: You're totally and completely fulfilled. Then Neil dies.

好吧 然后你发现他出轨过

德里克 你在吗？我是乔伊丝

你怎么挂断了？
我从上周就开始等着你来电呢

translation.en: -What? -Okay. Give me a holler.

-什么？
-好了 记得联系我

如果我不在家 就打我的手机
顺便说下 大家都爱你讲的笑话 再见

translation.en: His joke?

translation.en: What joke?

translation.en: Derek doesn't joke. Nobody thinks he's funny.

translation.en: He's not funny. What does this mean?

translation.en: I think it means she's not history.

translation.en: Is it always like this here?

translation.en: Hey, you got Derek's machine. You know what to do and when to do it.
translation.zh:
你好 这是德里克的语音信箱
你知道该怎么做 何时做

translation.en: It's Derek. He's checking the messages. He's going to hear Joyce.

是德里克 他在查看语音信箱
他会听到乔伊丝的留言

translation.zh:
-快删掉啊 砸掉 做点什么
-怎么做？我要怎么做才行？

translation.en: Kill it. Okay. Okay!

translation.en: Derek--
translation.zh: 德里克…

translation.en: -Good! There! -Yeah!
translation.zh:
-很好 成功了
-好棒

translation.en: What?

translation.en: I've just smashed an answering machine with a hockey stick.
translation.zh:
我刚刚用一根冰球棒
砸碎了一台自动答录机

translation.en: Damn proud of you!

translation.en: There were numbers on that machine that he needed, and I....
translation.zh: 那台机器上有他需要的号码 而我…

translation.en: I've just smashed it. I smashed the hell out of it.

translation.en: God's punishing me.

translation.en: I hear you, God. You can stop now.
translation.zh: 我听到了 上帝 你可以停止了

translation.en: What has happened to me?
translation.zh: 我这是怎么了？

translation.en: -You've discovered truth. -I've discovered a whole other reality.
translation.zh:
-你发现了真相
-我发现了截然不同的现实

translation.en: They all talk. Dr. Keyes and Derek. Joyce and Derek?
translation.zh:
他们都还在保持联系
吉斯医生和乔伊丝都与德里克有联系

translation.en: Maybe they all talk to each other. Maybe it's just me they don't talk to.
translation.zh:
或许他们相互之间都有联系
但就是把我排除在外

translation.en: Bottom line is, he's withheld.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 他有所隐瞒

translation.en: -I'm gonna find out what's going on. -Good!
translation.zh:
-我要查出到底是怎么回事
-很好

translation.en: -Why she was waiting for his call. -Good question.
translation.zh:
-她为什么在等着他的来电
-问得好

translation.en: -If he still sees her, why don't I know? -Better question.
translation.zh:
-如果他还在和她见面 我怎不知道？
-问得更好了

translation.en: And if he has nothing to hide, why hide these old relationships?
translation.zh:
如果他要隐瞒什么
为什么非得隐瞒这些旧恋情？

translation.en: -Want me to write these down for you? -So I guess I need to know...
translation.zh:
-要我替你把这些写下来吗？
-我需要知道…

translation.en: ...what I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道的事

translation.en: I just need to.
translation.zh: 我就是需要知道

translation.en: Hi. Joyce Moore?
translation.zh: 你好 是乔伊丝摩尔吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry to call so late.
translation.zh: 很抱歉这么晚打给你

translation.en: This is Barb Campbell-hyphen-Dunn from the Kippie Kann show.
translation.zh:
我是《凯皮卡安秀》的
芭芭拉坎贝尔邓恩

translation.en: We're doing a segment on chefs and we'd love to talk to you.
translation.zh:
我们在做一个关于大厨的节目
我们想跟你谈谈

translation.en: No, I'm not kidding.
translation.zh: 不 我不是在开玩笑

translation.en: Okay. So I'll call tomorrow, and we'll set something up.
translation.zh:
好的 那我明天给你打电话
我们安排见个面

translation.en: I'd love to talk to you. Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 我也很期待跟你谈谈 再见

translation.en: -I'll have a double espresso latte-- -Sorry. No.
translation.zh:
-我要杯双料浓缩拿铁…
-抱歉 不行

translation.en: -What? -I live in a basement apartment...
translation.zh:
-什么？
-我住在梅尔文路的一间地下室里

translation.en: ...on Malverne. You were hiding in my doorway last night, smothering a dog.
translation.zh:
你昨晚躲在我家门口
要把一只狗捂死

translation.en: I was not smothering him. It's a little game we play.
translation.zh:
我不是要捂死它
我们只是在玩游戏而已

translation.en: Double espresso, please.
translation.zh: 双料浓缩拿铁 拜托

translation.en: You already scare people.
translation.zh: 你已经吓到别人了

translation.en: -More caffeine will make you a freak. -Are you trying to upset me?
translation.zh:
-再喝咖啡 只会让你变成怪胎
-你是想惹我生气吗？

translation.en: If I do, you gonna hold my snout?
translation.zh: 如果我那样 你会捂住我的口鼻吗？

translation.en: I'll get the latte and you get a chai iced tea.
translation.zh: 我要拿铁 你买印度奶茶

translation.en: -We'll switch after. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
-我们待会儿换过来
-谢谢

translation.en: I heard that.
translation.zh: 我听到了

translation.en: Joyce. Hi.
translation.zh: 乔伊丝 你好

translation.en: Hi. You're Barb. How did you know it was me?
translation.zh: 你好 你是芭布 你怎么知道是我？

translation.en: Lucky guess.
translation.zh: 碰巧猜中了而已

translation.en: I'll be watching.
translation.zh: 我会盯着你们的

translation.en: You're a jokester. Yeah.
translation.zh: 你真喜欢开玩笑 真的

translation.en: We have this little thing.
translation.zh: 我们有个小节目

translation.en: So I've heard amazing things about you, about the Kaleidoscope.

我听说了很多
对你和万花筒餐厅的赞美

translation.en: -From? -People! Who've been there.
translation.zh:
-听谁说的？
-就是去过那里的人

translation.en: Who know your work. You have a fan base.

translation.en: -I'm only on two nights a week. -Quality, not quantity.

-我一周只会过去两个晚上
-重要的是质量 不是数量

translation.en: Yes. So tell me about the show.
translation.zh: 好吧 跟我说说那个节目吧

translation.en: I haven't watched much, but doesn't Kippie Kann do more of the...
translation.zh:
我有段时间没看过了
不过凯皮卡安的节目好像更多是

translation.en: -..."My Wife Slept With My Sister"--? -"And My Dad."
translation.zh:
-“我老婆跟我妹妹上床了”之类的
-“还跟我爸通奸”

translation.en: No, we're trying to revamp the show right now.
translation.zh: 不 我们现在正对节目进行改版

translation.en: So I pitched this idea, which is this cook-off.
translation.zh:
所以我提出了这个创意
是关于烹饪比赛的

translation.en: This is its research stage, where I pretend that I'm Diane Sawyer...
translation.zh:
现在是调研阶段
我会假装我是黛安索耶

translation.en: ...asking brilliant questions while looking chic.
translation.zh:
问一些精彩的问题
还要看上去很时尚

translation.en: That's funny. You know, she was in the restaurant last week.
translation.zh:
说起来真有趣
她上周才去过我们餐厅

translation.en: Do you want your latte?

translation.en: -No. Who was? -Diane Sawyer.
translation.zh:
-不了 谁去了？
-黛安索耶啊

translation.en: She was here? In Jersey?
translation.zh: 她来新泽西了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. The night manager knows her field producer...

translation.en: ...so they all came in for this big dinner. She's really nice.
translation.zh:
所以他们都来吃了一顿大餐
她人真的很好

translation.en: She is?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: I've wanted to meet her my whole entire life.
translation.zh: 我这一辈子都很期待见到她

translation.en: Then you will. I believe in destiny, don't you?
translation.zh:
你一定会见到的
我相信命运 你呢？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Excuse me. Coming. Coming. Coming.
translation.zh: 抱歉 来了…

translation.en: -Hey. -Kipp!
translation.zh:
-喂
-凯皮

translation.en: -I'm just in the middle of an interview. -Okay, yeah, I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-我在做采访呢
-好吧 抱歉

translation.en: Listen, real quick then.
