translation.en: My machine at home is screwed up. I need numbers.
translation.zh:
我家里的答录机坏掉了
我需要几个号码

translation.en: -Do you know where my Palm is? -Yep.
translation.zh:
-你知道我的手机在哪儿吗？
-知道

translation.en: That's great. Okay, I need to get--
translation.zh: 好极了 我需要知道…

translation.en: Could you look up Rafalsky....
translation.zh: 你能查一下拉法尔斯基…

translation.en: -Stace? -Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh:
-斯黛西
-好的 马上

translation.en: Can I borrow a pen and a piece of--? Thank you.
translation.zh: 你能借我一支笔吗？还有一张…谢谢

translation.en: -Thanks. -Rafalsky.
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-拉法尔斯基

translation.en: -Rafalsky. -And Langenbrunner.
translation.zh:
-拉法尔斯基
-兰根布莱纳

translation.en: And Langenbrunner.
translation.zh: 兰根布莱纳

translation.en: -Is that it? -That's it.
translation.zh:
-就这两个吗？
-是的

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you!
translation.zh: 我爱你…

translation.en: -You too, Kipp. -Oh, hey, listen.
translation.zh:
-我也爱你 凯皮
-对了 听着

translation.en: Before I forget, the password is "Bob."
translation.zh: 差点忘了告诉你 密码是“鲍勃”

translation.en: -Gotcha. -All right. Bye.
translation.zh:
-知道了
-好的 再见

translation.en: -Okay, then. -Can I ask you something...
translation.zh:
-好了
-我能问你一个

translation.en: ...totally none of my business? Were you just talking to Kippie Kann...
translation.zh:
跟我完全无关的问题吗？
你刚刚是在跟凯皮卡安

translation.en: ...about Jamie Langenbrunner and Brian Rafalsky?
translation.zh:
讨论杰米兰根布莱纳
和布莱恩拉法尔斯基吗？

translation.en: -You know them? -I wish.
translation.zh:
-你认识他们？
-我倒是想呢

translation.en: I am the biggest hockey nut this side of Newark.
translation.zh: 我是纽瓦克这边最大的冰球粉丝

translation.en: We're trying to book them on the show.
translation.zh: 我们想预约他们上节目呢

translation.en: We're doing a whole recruiting segment. I'm their hockey gal.
translation.zh:
我们在做一个全新的招募栏目
我就是他们的冰球球迷

translation.en: You should meet my ex. He's a scout for the Devils. Give me your Palm.
translation.zh:
你真该见见我前男友
他是魔鬼队的球探 把你的手机给我

translation.en: -It's frozen. -I can fix it.
translation.zh:
-卡住了
-我可以修好

translation.en: No, that's so sweet, but thank you.
translation.zh: 不 你很好心 不过谢谢了

translation.en: Okay, well, why don't you just hold down the power button.
translation.zh: 你何不按一下电源键试试呢？

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.zh: 按吧

translation.en: Power button?
translation.zh: 电源键？

translation.en: And you should hear a....
translation.zh: 你应该可以听到…

translation.en: -And, fingers crossed... -Fingers crossed.
translation.zh:
-祈祷吧
-祈祷

translation.en: ...it will reset.
translation.zh: 希望它能重启

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I cannot believe it.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信

translation.en: -I can explain. -You have I Spy.
translation.zh:
-我可以解释
-你竟然装了“我监视”

translation.en: That's a brand-new program. Do you mind?
translation.zh:
那可是个全新的程序
你介意吗？

translation.en: -Having I Spy? No, I don't mind. -Do you mind beaming it to me?
translation.zh:
-有“我监视”？不 我不介意
-你介意传输给我吗？

translation.en: Here, I can-- You want me to show you there? Just take this.
translation.zh: 我可以…要我教你吗？这样就行了

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: -...voilà! -Voilà what?
translation.zh:
-好了
-什么好了？

translation.en: -Voilà, now I've got it. -But it's his-- Mine.
translation.zh:
-现在我也有了
-但这是他的…我的

translation.en: -I want it back. Please? -No. We both have it.
translation.zh:
-我想拿回来 可以吗？
-不 现在我们都有了

translation.en: You have one, and I have its twin.
translation.zh: 你有一个 我也有一个一样的

translation.en: -You've never done it before. -Virgin. Damn proud of it.
translation.zh:
-你从没干过这事
-第一次 很骄傲呢

translation.en: You're funny.
translation.zh: 你很幽默啊

translation.en: So I work next Wednesday. Why don't you come by for dinner?
translation.zh:
我下周三会去上班
不如你过来吃晚餐吧？

translation.en: I will wow you with my chicken paillard.
translation.zh: 我做的烤鸡肉块一定会让你惊叹的

translation.en: How could I refuse? She had an ease, an openness...
translation.zh:
我怎么拒绝呢？
她有一种淡然 开明的气质

translation.en: ...and the answers. She had the answers.
translation.zh: 以及答案 她知晓所有答案

translation.en: Party!
translation.zh: 派对开始了

translation.en: Kippie! Watch it, here! Watch it!
translation.zh: 凯皮 当心…

translation.en: -Cut it! Phil, cut it! -Cut it. Reset.
translation.zh:
-停下 菲尔…
-停下 重新搭建现场

translation.en: Oh, God, she's coming up. She's coming up.
translation.zh: 天啊 她要上来了…

translation.en: -Count to 10. -Katie!
translation.zh:
-数十下
-凯蒂

translation.en: -Take it easy. -Okay!
translation.zh:
-冷静
-好的

translation.en: She's coming!
translation.zh: 她要来了

translation.en: -Seven, eight, nine.... -Carl!
translation.zh:
-七 八 九…
-卡尔

translation.en: What? You were fantastic.
translation.zh: 怎么了？你刚刚简直棒极了

translation.en: -That was very emotional. Phil? -Yeah. I teared up.
translation.zh:
-情绪很饱满 菲尔 你说呢？
-是啊 我都流泪了

translation.en: Trust me. No one does midgets like Kippie. Like you.
translation.zh:
相信我 做侏儒节目
没人比得上你凯皮

translation.en: But everyone does them! Don't you get it?
translation.zh:
但所有人都在做侏儒节目
你还不明白吗？

translation.en: -I want something fresh, original-- -It was his idea.
translation.zh:
-我想要新鲜的 原创的…
-那是他的主意

translation.en: -Ira? -Now she remembers my name.
translation.zh:
-埃拉？
-现在她倒是记得我的名字了

translation.en: Get the midgets out of here.
translation.zh: 把这些侏儒都赶走

translation.en: Here comes the numbers speech.
translation.zh: 接下来又要针对收视率做长篇大论了

translation.en: Can you be midget-wrangler today?

translation.en: My numbers go up, your numbers go up.
translation.zh:
我的收视率上去了
你们的业绩才能提升

translation.en: My success is your success.
translation.zh: 我的成功就是你们的成功

translation.en: Jerry Maguire.
translation.zh: 《征服情海》的台词

translation.en: Help Kippie help you!
translation.zh: 帮助凯皮就是帮助你们自己

translation.en: That was very moving. I think we should all take a moment to--

真是太感人了
我觉得我们应该休息下…

translation.en: -Places! Miserable midgets. -Moment's up!
translation.zh:
-可悲的侏儒们 就位
-不休息了

translation.zh:
-就位 准备开始
-马上重新开始

translation.en: -We are just about ready. -Phil, we're reset.
translation.zh:
-差不多准备好了
-菲尔 现场已重新搭建好

translation.en: Okay, stand by, Kippie.
translation.zh: 好了 准备好 凯皮

translation.en: "Kippie's Kute Kouplings Kontinues."
translation.zh: “凯皮的可爱夫妻栏目继续进行”

translation.en: Bob, I want you to move in really tight.

translation.en: Tighter, tighter, tighter, till I tell you to stop.
translation.zh: 一直缩进 我叫你停再停

translation.en: Yeah. Right there.
translation.zh:
-好了 就是这里
-那块胶布是什么？

translation.en: We have a collection of cute couples to clear things up. I can't believe this.
translation.zh:
我们有一系列的可爱小夫妻
来消除误会 我真不敢相信 （凯皮卡安之家）

translation.en: What are you so worried about?
translation.zh: 你到底在担心些什么？

translation.en: Do you think my idea is good?
translation.zh: 你觉得我的创意好吗？

translation.en: -I mean, enough? -For the live show? Absolutely.
translation.zh:
-我是说 足够好吗？
-用于直播节目吗？当然了

translation.en: I'm convinced they're going to give it to you.
translation.zh:
-我坚信他们会把机会给你的
-“奶奶原来是爷爷” 请来这边

translation.en: -Why? What do you know? -Not much. It's just, after staff--

-为什么？你听到什么风声了吗？
-不多 就是在员工会议后…

translation.en: -When? -Monday.
translation.zh:
-什么时候？
-周一

translation.en: -Today's the big day! -I know!
translation.zh:
-今天是我的大日子
-我知道

translation.en: -Go on. -I overheard them.
translation.zh:
-继续说
-我无意中听到他们说的

translation.en: Pardon me? Who, who?
translation.zh: 什么？谁啊？

translation.en: -Barb, Carl, Kippie. -Kippie? Kippie? Kippie's there?
translation.zh:
-芭布 卡尔和凯皮
-凯皮…凯皮也在场？

translation.en: -Yes. -Continue.
translation.zh:
-是的
-继续说

translation.en: Well, they thought your "Little Black Book" idea was great.
translation.zh: 他们说你的“小黑书”创意很棒

translation.en: They're right. I mean, it's my time.
translation.zh: 他们说得对 的确该轮到我了

translation.en: I put in the work. I'm next up for promotion.
translation.zh:
我付出了努力
下一个升职的就该是我了

translation.en: -It only makes sense. -It only makes sense.
translation.zh:
-只有这样才能说得通
-没错

translation.en: Little black books. Little black books. Little black books.

translation.en: This season's live show will be...

translation.en: ..."Plastic Surgery Nightmares." Congratulations, Barb.
translation.zh: “整容手术噩梦”恭喜 芭布

translation.en: Our newest producer.
translation.zh: 我们最新的制片人

translation.en: -Way to go, girl! -Good one.
translation.zh:
-好样的 姑娘
-好样的

translation.en: Now, people. People, people!
translation.zh: 各位…

translation.en: Since we are live, I'm expecting everybody to pitch in, right?
translation.zh:
既然是直播
大家都要努力投入 好吗？

translation.en: Right. Now that's a wrap.
translation.zh: 好了 就到这里吧

translation.en: Too bad, Ira.
translation.zh: 太遗憾了 埃拉

translation.en: Sorry, Ira. Maybe next sweeps?
translation.zh:
我很遗憾 埃拉
要不等下个电视季？

translation.en: Sweet.
translation.zh: 真贴心

translation.en: Naive, but sweet.
translation.zh: 很天真 但很贴心

translation.en: You wanna go to dinner?
translation.zh: 你想出去吃个晚餐吗？

translation.en: Can't. I'm on the committee for the Kippie Kann Kan Drive...
translation.zh: 去不了 我是“凯皮卡安可以开车

translation.en: ...Kippie Kares for Kids Koalition. Catch you later.
translation.zh:
凯皮关心孩子”联合委员会的人
稍后再聊吧

translation.en: -Is he okay? -He's trying to be.
translation.zh:
-他还好吧？
-他在努力控制

translation.en: How about you? Urban legend.
translation.zh: 那你呢？都市传奇

translation.en: -You said APs never get the live show. -What do I know?
translation.zh:
-你说过副制片人拿不到直播节目
-我知道个什么？

translation.en: Come with me. I've got a surprise for you.
translation.zh: 跟我来 我为你准备了一份惊喜

translation.en: Carl, here she is.
translation.zh: 卡尔 她来了

translation.en: Stacy, Kippie liked your idea too.
translation.zh: 斯黛西 凯皮也喜欢你的创意

translation.en: For the tri-state cook-off! So if you could ask--
translation.zh:
三州区的烹饪大赛节目
所以如果你能问问…

translation.en: -What's her name? -Joyce.
translation.zh:
-那人叫什么来着？
-乔伊丝

translation.en: -If we could have it at the-- -Kaleidoscope Kitchen.
translation.zh:
-如果我们能在…
-万花筒厨房

translation.en: Oh, love the K's. And Kippie loves cook-offs...
translation.zh:
好喜欢这双K字母开头
凯皮喜欢烹饪大赛

translation.en: ...so you get those pre-interviews in. Barb, you co-pilot.
translation.zh:
所以你要在周末前做好预采访工作
芭布 你是联合负责人

translation.en: -Katie. -Carl.
translation.zh:
-凯蒂
-卡尔

translation.en: -Was he saying--? Are you saying--? -Congratulations.
translation.zh:
-他的意思是…你是说…
-恭喜

translation.en: My first show!
translation.zh: 我的第一个节目

translation.en: I mean, it's not a done deal or anything, but--
translation.zh: 虽然现在还没有完全确定 但是…

translation.en: At least I'll have something legitimate to offer Joyce.
translation.zh: 至少我有正当的节目提供给乔伊丝了

translation.en: This is perfect. It's perfect! Thank you.
translation.zh: 真是太完美了…谢谢你

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -That's okay. It's fine. I'm smiling.
translation.zh:
-对不起
-没事 我还在微笑呢

translation.en: Now Joyce could bake her cake, and the audience could eat it too.
translation.zh:
现在 乔伊丝可以烤蛋糕
观众们也能吃到了

translation.en: Get that out to table four. Make sure they still have wine.
translation.zh:
把那个端去四号桌
记得确认他们还有酒

translation.en: Which somehow made me feel a little less like the lying scumbag that I was.
translation.zh:
那让我稍微觉得
不像之前那样是个满口谎言的人渣了

translation.en: And voilà!
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -And this is for dessert. -What?
translation.zh:
-就当这是甜点吧
-什么？

translation.en: What did you do?
translation.zh: 你做了什么啊？

translation.en: Joyce.
translation.zh: 乔伊丝

translation.en: -Open it! -"To Barb, I can't wait--
translation.zh:
-打开吧
-“赠给芭布 我迫不及待

translation.en: Love, Diane." I can't believe you!
translation.zh: 爱你的 黛安”我真觉得难以置信

translation.en: The night manager got it for you. It's just a little thing.
translation.zh:
是我们夜班经理替你拿到的
小事而已

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你
-不客气

translation.en: -Table 24 left this for you. -Thank you, Gordon.
translation.zh:
-24号桌的客人留给你的
-谢谢你 戈登

translation.en: -It's Pat Burns. -Head coach for the New Jersey Devils.
translation.zh:
-是帕特伯恩斯
-他是新泽西魔鬼队的主教练

translation.en: Right, I forgot. You're the hockey gal.
translation.zh: 好吧 我忘了 你是冰球球迷

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Tickets for the playoffs? You're beloved.
translation.zh: 季后赛的票？你很受人喜欢啊

translation.en: Come with me. They're for tomorrow night. I mean, if you can.
translation.zh:
跟我一起去吧
明晚的 如果你有时间的话

translation.en: These are tickets for the Stanley Cup. You're a crazy girl.
translation.zh: 这可是斯坦利杯比赛的票啊 你疯了

translation.en: Well, I don't know anyone else who likes hockey.
translation.zh: 我不认识其他喜欢冰球的人

translation.en: Except my little brother, and I'd rather go with you.
translation.zh: 除了我弟弟 不过我情愿跟你一起去

translation.en: -And Derek will be there. -I'm-- Who?
translation.zh:
-德里克也会去的
-谁？

translation.en: My ex.
translation.zh: 我前男友

translation.en: I told you about him. He works for the Devils.
translation.zh: 我跟你提过他 他替魔鬼队工作

translation.en: We'll meet him after the game for a drink. It's a ritual.
translation.zh:
我们会在赛后跟他见面喝一杯
算是老习惯了

translation.en: Oh, really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: The beautiful people have arrived.
translation.zh: 那帮美丽的人来了

translation.en: They come every Wednesday night to be seen.
translation.zh: 他们每周三晚都会来秀一下

translation.en: I better call the manager and make sure the camera crew is cleared.
translation.zh:
我最好跟经理说一声
确保摄像团队没问题

translation.en: So we're on? Great. Call me. You have my number?
translation.zh:
所以我们会一起去看比赛吗？
打电话给我 你有我号码吧？

translation.en: -Yep. -Okay, good.
translation.zh:
-有的
-很好

translation.en: Those are Manolos, you clumsy--
translation.zh:
我这可是名牌鞋
你这个笨手笨脚的…

translation.en: Joyce.
translation.zh: 乔伊丝

translation.en: If I were you, I wouldn't finish that statement.
translation.zh: 如果我是你 就不会把那句话说完

translation.en: Stacy?
translation.zh: 斯黛西？ （万花筒厨房 甜点）

translation.en: Lulu!
translation.zh: 我是露露啊

translation.en: Get a shot of us. She produces the Kippie Kann show.
translation.zh:
给我们拍张合照
她是《凯皮卡安秀》的制片人

translation.en: -Why is she calling you Stacy, Barb? -That's her name.
translation.zh:
-她为什么叫你斯黛西？芭布
-她就叫这名字啊

translation.en: No, actually, my name is Barb.
translation.zh: 不 实际上我叫芭布

translation.en: The other woman you met's name is Stacy.
translation.zh:
你见到的另一个女人的名字
才是斯黛西

translation.en: -No? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-不是吗？
-是的

translation.en: -She was Barb. -No.
translation.zh:
-她是芭布
-不是

translation.en: No-- What?
translation.zh: 不 什么？

translation.en: -Enjoy your meal. -Join us, Stacy-Barb?
translation.zh:
-祝你用餐愉快
-要跟我们一起吗？斯黛西芭布？

translation.en: Okay, Phillip. Bring your camera.
translation.zh: 好了 菲利普 把摄像机扛过来

translation.en: How do you know her?
translation.zh: 你怎么认识她的？

translation.en: -We did a show last year on bulimia. -Oh, why am I not surprised?
translation.zh:
-我们去年做了期关于贪食症的节目
-我怎么一点都不惊讶呢？

translation.en: She does make you wanna throw up. Or at least me.
translation.zh: 她确实让人想吐 至少让我想吐

translation.en: -Sorry, I don't really like her, I guess. -"I guess"?
translation.zh:
-抱歉 大概是我真的很不喜欢她吧
-“大概”？

translation.en: She used to hang out with my brother, and I sort of took her under my wing...
translation.zh:
她以前经常跟我弟弟一起玩
我一直都很照顾她

translation.en: ...until she took Derek from under mine.
translation.zh: 直到她把德里克从我身边抢走

translation.en: -He cheated on you with her? -No, we had split up.
translation.zh:
-他跟她出轨了？
-不 我们当时已经分开了

translation.en: But one day we're talking about getting married...
translation.zh: 但是 前一天我们还在商量结婚的事

translation.en: ...and the next day we're dating other people.
translation.zh: 第二天 我们就在跟别的人约会了

translation.en: Taking space.
translation.zh: 留给对方一点空间

translation.en: God, I hate that expression, don't you?
translation.zh: 天啊 我好讨厌这个说法 你呢？

translation.en: Hate it. So then?
translation.zh: 我也很讨厌 然后呢？

translation.en: So then he starts talking to Lulu, who totally knows the score.
translation.zh:
于是他就开始找露露倾诉
她完全其中的技巧

translation.en: And then she advises me to see other people.
translation.zh: 然后她就建议我跟别的人恋爱

translation.en: -Hideous. -And she meant nothing to him.
translation.zh:
-真丑恶
-她对他毫无意义

translation.en: She was a fling. I mean, he wanted us to get back together.
translation.zh:
他对她只是随便玩玩而已
他一直希望我们能复合

translation.en: But, in a way, we're just closer being friends.
translation.zh:
但是 某种程度上
我们做朋友更加亲近

translation.en: You are? Good. You are.
translation.zh: 真的吗？很好啊 真的啊

translation.en: We are, and if not, there's always the boomerangs.
translation.zh: 真的 就算不行 也有回力标

translation.en: -The boomerangs. -Yeah. You know the kind.
translation.zh:
-回力标啊
-是啊 你知道是什么样的

translation.en: You throw them out there into the world....
translation.zh: 你把它们扔得远远的

translation.en: -And they always come back to you. -Yeah, that's right.
translation.zh:
-它们总是会回到你身边
-是啊 没错

translation.en: He bought us each one, and we promised never to throw them away.
translation.zh:
他给我们每人买了一个
我们约定了永远不扔掉

translation.en: So no matter what happened, if we needed to, or wanted to...
translation.zh:
所以不管发生了什么事
如果我们需要 或者想要

translation.en: -...then we could still end up.... -Together.
translation.zh:
-那我们依然可以…
-在一起

translation.en: Anyway, whatever.
translation.zh: 好吧 随便吧

translation.en: Why were we talking about this?
translation.zh: 我们为什么要谈这个？

translation.en: You know, he probably wouldn't even remember the story...
translation.zh: 他很可能都不记得这个故事了

translation.en: ...never mind the boomerangs, and then there's me, the romantic sap...
translation.zh: 更别提回力标了 而我这个痴情人

translation.en: ...who still has hers framed in the bedroom.
translation.zh: 却依然把它挂在卧室里

translation.en: How stupid is that?
translation.zh: 多傻啊

translation.en: Not stupid.
translation.zh: 并不傻

translation.en: It's just a waste of energy.
translation.zh: 只是浪费精力罢了

translation.en: There's so many other interesting guys out there for you.
translation.zh: 有好多有趣的男人在等着你去挑呢

translation.en: Joyce, you're gonna meet the right person. Watch.
translation.zh:
乔伊丝 你会遇到你的真命天子的
等着瞧吧

translation.en: Or I could end up with Derek.
translation.zh: 或者 我最后也可能跟德里克在一起

translation.en: Wouldn't that be funny?
translation.zh: 那很有趣不是吗？

translation.en: Right now I'm not rushing into anything or anyone.
translation.zh: 现在 我不会对任何人或事仓促决定

translation.en: Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice....
translation.zh: 骗我一次 你真可耻 骗我两次

translation.en: -Shame on me. -Exactly.
translation.zh:
-算我丢人
-没错

translation.en: Something about the way she believed she might get him back...
translation.zh: 她相信他们有一天可能会复合

translation.en: ...made me believe it too.
translation.zh: 那竟然让我也信了

translation.en: Thanks, pal.
translation.zh: 谢了 兄弟

translation.en: I'm home!
translation.zh: 我回家了

translation.en: Hey, Bob. How you doing?
translation.zh: 鲍勃 你还好吗？

translation.en: Come here, buddy. Come here. Yeah. Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 过来 小家伙 真乖

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey. I heard you from downstairs.
translation.zh:
-好啊
-好啊 我在楼下就听到你的歌声了

translation.en: -You did? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-是啊

translation.en: Yikes. Was I that loud?
translation.zh: 天啊 我唱得那么大声吗？

translation.en: No, you sounded great. Kind of sad, though. Everything okay?
translation.zh:
不 你唱得很好听
不过有点太悲伤了 没什么事吧？

translation.en: Yeah. You know, work issues, but I'm fine.
translation.zh: 当然了 就是工作问题 但我没事

translation.en: -You're home early. -You say that like that's a bad thing.
translation.zh:
-你提前回来了啊
-你说得好像这是坏事一样

translation.en: No! No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不 当然不是

translation.en: I just didn't expect you, that's all.
translation.zh: 我只是没想到你会回来而已

translation.en: What happened to the other guy?
translation.zh: 那玩意儿是怎么了？

translation.en: A mouse.
translation.zh: 老鼠干的

translation.en: -A mouse did this? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-老鼠把它弄成这样的？
-是啊

translation.en: There was a mouse, and, you know, Bob freaked...
translation.zh: 突然出现了一只老鼠 鲍勃吓坏了

translation.en: -...and forget about it. -A mouse scared Bob?
translation.zh:
-忘了这回事吧
-老鼠吓到了鲍勃

translation.en: Went crazy. You wouldn't believe it.
translation.zh: 太疯狂了 你一定觉得难以置信

translation.en: He chased him onto the answering machine...
translation.zh: 鲍勃追着老鼠来到答录机旁边

translation.en: ...where the mouse just, like, taunted and taunted Bob.
translation.zh: 那老鼠似乎在激怒鲍勃

translation.en: So I ran and I got your stick, your hockey stick...
translation.zh: 我就跑过来 抓住你的棒子 冰球棒

translation.en: ...and I just smashed it.
translation.zh: 然后我把它砸烂了

translation.en: -You smashed a mouse? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你把老鼠砸烂了？
-是啊

translation.en: No, like I would smash a mouse.
translation.zh: 不是 我怎么会砸烂老鼠

translation.en: He got away, but I scared him good.
translation.zh: 它逃跑了 但被我吓得不行了

translation.en: I don't think he'll be coming back.
translation.zh: 我觉得它短期内不会再回来了

translation.en: -He carry my box down too? -That's very funny.
translation.zh:
-它还把我的盒子搬下来了？
-真搞笑啊

translation.en: No, I did.
translation.zh: 不 是我搬下来的

translation.en: I was looking for another phone.
translation.zh: 我当时在找另一部手机

translation.en: Which you found, in a closed box marked "personal stuff."
translation.zh:
你在写了“私人物品”
并且还封起来了的箱子里找到了

translation.en: No offense, Derek, but you're not exactly Mr. Organized.
translation.zh:
无意冒犯 德里克 但你并不是个
把东西整理得井井有条的人

translation.en: -You're a mess. -All right, all right.
translation.zh:
-你平时就挺乱的
-好吧…

translation.en: Don't go criticizing homie. Homie just got home.
translation.zh: 别批评我啊 我才刚到家呢

translation.en: -Yo, I was defending your dog, yo. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-我当时可是在守卫你的狗狗
-谢谢你了

translation.en: Who gets very sad when you're away.
translation.zh: 你不在的时候 它就很难过

translation.en: Very needy.
translation.zh: 非常黏人

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -He missed you.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-它想你了

translation.en: -He the only one? -No, Joyce missed you too.
translation.zh:
-它是唯一想我的吗？
-不 乔伊丝也想你了

translation.en: So you wanna know why I'm home early?
translation.zh: 你想知道我为什么会提前回来吗？

translation.en: I'm seeing Robbie Moore's parents tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明晚要见罗比摩尔的父母

translation.en: -That means you're close. -Bringing the contract.
translation.zh:
-那意味着你就快成功了
-把合同带着

translation.en: -Wait, wait. Tomorrow's the playoffs. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-等着 明天是季后赛啊
-是啊

translation.en: -You're not gonna go? -No.
translation.zh:
-你不去吗？
-不去

translation.en: If I don't close this kid tomorrow, Terry's gonna sign him.
translation.zh:
如果我明天不签下这小子
泰瑞就会签下他

translation.en: I can't miss the opportunity.
translation.zh: 我不能错过这个机会

translation.en: You know what? I'm doing this for both of us.
translation.zh:
你知道吗？
我这么做是为了我们的未来

translation.en: I'm sorry, Bob. All of us.
translation.zh: 对不起 鲍勃 是为了我们三个的未来

translation.en: I felt like a lying sack of fertilizer.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己像个满口谎言的人渣

translation.en: Knowing what I knew and not knowing what I didn't...
translation.zh:
知道我所知道的这些
对于未知的 却又全然不知…

translation.en: ...and knowing more than anything that I had to know more.
translation.zh:
心里非常清楚
我必须查探到更多的东西

translation.en: She called all the time, begging him, pleading, pathetic.
translation.zh:
她经常打电话给他 求他复合
太可悲了

translation.en: He played me the messages on the machine. They were hysterical.
translation.zh:
他给我播放过答录机上的留言
简直歇斯底里

translation.en: She was desperate.
translation.zh: 她已经抛弃了自尊

translation.en: One angry chef, coming up.
translation.zh: 接下来是一个愤怒的大厨

translation.en: I can't show her that.
translation.zh: 我不能给她看这个

translation.en: I'd be purposely hurting a friend.
translation.zh: 那我就是在故意伤害朋友了

translation.en: Knowledge is a terrible and a marvelous thing.
translation.zh: 信息是可怕又了不起的东西

translation.en: It just depends on your perspective.
translation.zh: 就看你怎么看待了

translation.en: Think of it this way.
translation.zh: 这么想吧

translation.en: If she knew who you really were, she'd hate you.
translation.zh:
如果她知道你的真实身份
就会讨厌你

translation.en: Can you blame her?
translation.zh: 你能怪她吗？

translation.en: And, Stace?
translation.zh: 并且 斯黛西？

translation.en: She's not your friend.
translation.zh: 她并不是你的朋友

translation.en: Have fun at the game.
translation.zh: 祝你看比赛愉快

translation.en: Hi, I'm sorry I'm late. I was in the middle of a crisis with Derek.
translation.zh:
你好啊 抱歉 我来晚了
刚刚跟德里克处理问题去了

translation.en: I'm helping him with something.
translation.zh: 我不得不帮他的忙

translation.en: Doesn't he have someone else to help, like a girlfriend?
translation.zh:
他就找不到别人帮忙吗？
比如 女朋友？

translation.en: Probably a bunch. But....
translation.zh: 可能有很多吧 但是…

translation.en: We agreed not to discuss anyone we date, unless one of us was serious.
translation.zh:
我们之前约定过 不谈各自的对象
除非是真的要结婚那种

translation.en: Then we have to, but he's not, and I'm not.
translation.zh:
那就不得不谈了
但他还没遇到 我也没有

translation.en: So why torture each other? You know, it's just too painful for both of us.
translation.zh:
所以 为什么要彼此折磨呢？
那对我们双方而言都太痛苦了

translation.en: Sorry, that's my cell.
translation.zh: 抱歉 是我的手机响了

translation.en: Hello? Hey, I was just talking about you.
translation.zh: 喂？我刚正聊到你呢

translation.en: Derek.
translation.zh: 是德里克

translation.en: So, what happened?
translation.zh: 发生什么事了？

translation.en: You might think it odd that I didn't strangle her...
translation.zh:
你可能觉得奇怪
我看着她跟我男人调情

translation.en: ...as I watched her flirt and coo with my man.
translation.zh: 温柔地说话 为什么没掐死她

translation.en: But I didn't.
translation.zh: 但我就是没有

translation.en: I was strangely drawn to their banter.
translation.zh: 我神奇地被他们的说笑吸引了

translation.en: Curious about this part of his life...
translation.zh: 对他这一面的生活感到很好奇

translation.en: ...that I had been completely dumb to just a few days earlier.
translation.zh:
因为就在几天前
我对此还完全一无所知呢

translation.en: They had a past.
translation.zh: 他们有共同的过去

translation.en: -They had a present separate from me. -They scored. Listen.
translation.zh:
-他们还拥有与我隔离的现在
-他们得分了 听啊

translation.en: Can you hear?
translation.zh: 你能听到吗？

translation.en: She didn't know he had a girlfriend, but she didn't want to.
translation.zh:
她不知道他有女朋友了
但她也不想知道

translation.en: Suddenly, I knew what I had to do.
translation.zh: 突然间 我知道我需要做什么了

translation.en: Finally I asked him to go back to his old girlfriend.
translation.zh: 最后 我叫他跟他前女友复合

translation.en: She called all the time, begging him, pleading.
translation.zh: 她经常打电话给他 求他复合

translation.en: -She was desperate. -Joyce?
translation.zh:
-她当时为爱抛弃自尊
-乔伊丝？

translation.en: -How'd you know her name? -You mentioned it.
translation.zh:
-你怎么知道她的名字？
-你刚刚提到了

translation.en: -You did. -She did.
translation.zh:
-你是提到了
-她提到了

translation.en: I did?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Well, yes. Joyce.
translation.zh: 没错 是乔伊丝

translation.en: He only went back to her out of pity.
translation.zh: 他完全是因为可怜她才跟她复合的

translation.en: Barb was right.
translation.zh: 芭布说得对

translation.en: As soon as Joyce realized that he'd lied to her about Lulu...
translation.zh:
一旦乔伊丝意识到
关于露露的事 他对她撒谎了

translation.en: ...she'd never forgive him.
translation.zh: 她就永远不会原谅他了

translation.en: Which was, after all, what I'd wanted.
translation.zh: 那也是我想要的结果

translation.en: So why did I feel so bad?
translation.zh: 那么 我为什么觉得这么愧疚呢？

translation.en: -I shouldn't have shown you that. -No, I appreciate it, really.
translation.zh:
-我不该给你看那个的
-不 我很感激 真的

translation.en: It's just so bad, you know.
translation.zh: 只是太糟糕了

translation.en: I probably did call him a few times when he was with her.
translation.zh:
他跟她在一起时
我或许确实给他打过几次电话

translation.en: But I was upset. I wouldn't characterize it as being hysterical or pathetic.
translation.zh:
但我当时很难过
我觉得那完全算不上歇斯底里或可悲

translation.en: But for her to know...
translation.zh: 但既然她知道这些事

translation.en: ...that I called means that he told her.
translation.zh: 意味着他把我打电话的事告诉她了

translation.en: Even if she didn't hear it, she knew, and that's just so bad.
translation.zh:
就算她没听到 也知道了
那真是太糟糕了

translation.en: Joyce, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 乔伊丝 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: -He's in there. -Where?
translation.zh:
-他在里面
-哪里？

translation.en: Right there, with the orange sweater and the stupid haircut.
translation.zh:
就在那里 穿着橙色毛衣
发型傻兮兮的那个

translation.en: It is stupid.
translation.zh: 的确傻兮兮的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: We stood there...
translation.zh: 我们就站在那里

translation.en: ...both of us sadly in love with the same man.
translation.zh: 我们都可悲地爱着同一个男人

translation.en: Both of us feeling let down by him.
translation.zh: 我们都对他感到失望

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你要去哪儿？

translation.en: I'm going home. I'll see you tomorrow for the pre-interview. Good night, Barb.
translation.zh:
我要回家了 明天预采访时再见
晚安 芭布

translation.en: Wait, Joyce?
translation.zh: 等等 乔伊丝

translation.en: Wait. Please. Wait.
translation.zh: 等等 拜托了 等等

translation.en: -That tape, the Lulu-- -You know what, it's not about the tape.
translation.zh:
-那盘录像带 露露的…
-重点根本不在于那盘录像带

translation.en: It's just...
translation.zh: 只是…

translation.en: ...talking to you and seeing Lulu. All that stuff brought up bad memories.
translation.zh:
跟你聊天 又看到露露
让我回忆起很多不堪的往事

translation.en: And who am I trying to kid, you know?
translation.zh: 我到底想欺骗谁啊？

translation.en: A clean break is easier. You can reset it...
translation.zh:
一个全新的开始还更容易些
你可以重启一切

translation.en: ...and it heals, and you move on.
translation.zh: 伤口会愈合 你可以向前看

translation.en: But if you leave things messy or things don't get put right...
translation.zh: 但如果你没有恰当地处理好旧情

translation.en: ...then it just hurts.
translation.zh: 它依然会造成伤痛

translation.en: Forever.
translation.zh: 永远都会

translation.en: It's really time for me to move away from him.
translation.zh: 我真的该远离他了

translation.en: From all this.
translation.zh: 远离这一切

translation.en: I don't even know who he is anymore.
translation.zh: 我现在好像不认识他这个人了一样

translation.en: I should have felt happier at that moment.
translation.zh: 那一刻我应该感觉更开心些的

translation.en: I had won.
translation.zh: 我赢了

translation.en: But the cost was high and the victory hollow.
translation.zh: 但是代价太大了 胜利也很空虚

translation.en: I had taken a good friend from someone I loved.
translation.zh: 我让我爱的人失去了一个好朋友

translation.en: And nothing about that felt right.
translation.zh: 无论如何我都觉得那很不对

translation.en: I needed a reality check. I needed Mom.
translation.zh: 我需要确认一下现实 我需要我妈妈

translation.en: But she was out. So I settled for Carly.
translation.zh: 但她不在 所以只能听卡莉的歌了

translation.en: The line between right and wrong had blurred.
translation.zh: 对与错之间的界线已经模糊

translation.en: In my search for truth, I had become the lie.
translation.zh:
在寻找真相的过程中
我已经变成了谎言

translation.en: Perhaps some secrets should remain secret.
translation.zh: 或许有些秘密就不该被翻出来

translation.en: Okay, you guys are not that bright. Can I have an amen?
translation.zh:
好了 你们不怎么聪明啊
有人赞同我吗？

translation.en: Is everything okay?
translation.zh: 一切都好吗？

translation.en: It's great. Yeah.
translation.zh: 好得很 没事

translation.en: -That makes one of us. -What's the matter?
translation.zh:
-我觉得糟糕透了
-怎么了？

translation.en: I'm not feeling so, you know, good.
translation.zh: 我感觉…不太好

translation.en: You can't go home. I mean, I need you.
translation.zh: 你不能回家 我需要你

translation.en: Today's my show. I'm a nervous wreck. We're live.
translation.zh:
今天我的节目要开播了
我紧张死了 我们是直播啊

translation.en: Oh, my God. I totally forgot. Of course I'll be here.
translation.zh:
我的天啊 我完全忘了
我当然会待在这里

translation.en: Wouldn't miss it for the world.
translation.zh: 无论如何也不会错过的

translation.en: You are so beautiful, like a real producer.
translation.zh: 你真漂亮 像一名真正的制片人

translation.en: Hello. Headset.
translation.zh: 你好 给你耳机

translation.en: And there was something I needed to tell you. What was it?
translation.zh:
还有一些事情我需要告诉你
是什么来着？

translation.en: -Oh, right. We're live. -There she is.
translation.zh:
-对了 我们是直播
-她出场了

translation.en: -Yikes. -Showtime.
translation.zh:
-天啊
-好戏开始了

translation.en: Great to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你们

translation.en: -Welcome to Kippie Kann Live. -Watch this ladder.
translation.zh:
-欢迎收看《凯皮卡安直播秀》
-当心梯子

translation.en: I need a running order.
translation.zh: 我需要一份流程表

translation.en: -Who's on first? -You.
translation.zh:
这是与众不同的直播秀
我们请到了不同凡响的客人… -谁是第一个？
-你

translation.en: -What? -It's for you.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-这是为你准备的

translation.en: -What is? -Everything.
translation.zh:
-什么是为我准备的？
-一切

translation.en: Let's see who's at Kippie's door.
translation.zh: 我们看看是谁来到凯皮门口了

translation.en: Just go with it.
translation.zh: 顺其自然吧

translation.en: Stacy, oh, come on out.
translation.zh: 斯黛西 出来吧

translation.en: That's right, Stacy. Make yourself comfortable.
translation.zh: 没错 斯黛西 别拘束

translation.en: You look a little confused.
translation.zh: 你看起来有点困惑

translation.en: -Know the name of today's show? -"Plastic Surgery Nightmares"?
translation.zh:
-知道今天节目的名字吗？
-“整容噩梦”？

translation.en: No. Actually it's called "Little Black Book."
translation.zh: 不 节目名字其实叫“小黑书”

translation.en: Let's fill our audience in on some recent history.
translation.zh: 我们先给观众补一下前情

translation.en: Stacy's a new member of our staff who's been using resources here...
translation.zh:
斯黛西是我们的一位新员工
她使用这里的资源

translation.en: ...to do her own personal research...
translation.zh: 在她的男朋友

translation.en: ...on her boyfriend, Derek.
translation.zh: 德瑞克身上做个人研究

translation.en: And three of his ex-girlfriends.
translation.zh: 还有他的三个前女友

translation.en: -Oh, no. -Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不要啊…

translation.en: Oh, yes.
translation.zh: 当然要

translation.en: She went through his little black electronic book...
translation.zh: 她翻看了他的电子小黑书

translation.en: -...found his ex-girlfriends... -I don't believe this.
translation.zh:
-发现了他的前女友们的号码
-真不敢相信

translation.en: ...and interviewed them under the guise of being a guest on our show.
translation.zh:
谎称要请她们来我们的节目当嘉宾
对她们进行采访

translation.en: -That's my idea. -Wow, man, too bad.
translation.zh:
-那是我的创意…
-太遗憾了

translation.en: -Barb's upstairs, if you wanna kill her. -And they will be.
translation.zh:
-芭布在楼上 你想杀了她就去吧
-她们的确会来当嘉宾

translation.en: But not for the reasons they thought.
translation.zh: 但她们并不知道来这里的真实原因

translation.en: Take, for example, supermodel Lulu Fritz.
translation.zh: 比如超级名模露露弗里茨

translation.en: Welcome to Kippie Kann Live.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到《凯皮卡安直播秀》

translation.en: You used us. You took my idea, and you set her up.
translation.zh:
你利用了我们 偷走了我的创意
还出卖了她

translation.en: -How can you just stand there? -Camera two.
translation.zh:
-你怎么能就这么站在那里？
-二号摄像机

translation.en: -You stole my idea. -It's poetry.
translation.zh:
-你偷了我的创意
-简直太有诗意了

translation.en: -You stole it. -I'll share credit. Ira...
translation.zh:
-你偷走了它
-我会把功劳与你共享的 埃拉

translation.en: ...there's a bigger thing happening. Just watch. God, are you watching?
translation.zh:
现在事情简直越来越精彩了
看好了 天啊 你在看吗？

translation.en: It was all superficial. Completely about sex.
translation.zh:
只是肤浅的一段感情而已
完全是为了性爱

translation.en: I'd have to say no. That's not from my documentary.
translation.zh: 我必须否认 那并非出自我的纪录片

translation.en: That's right, Lulu. It's all a ruse.
translation.zh: 没错 露露 那是个花招

translation.en: A flower?
translation.zh: 是花吗？

translation.en: -A ruse, a joke. This woman... -How can you do this?
translation.zh:
-一个花招 一个玩笑 这个女人…
-你怎么能这么做？

translation.en: ...Stacy Holt, a member of our staff, got you here under false pretenses.
translation.zh:
斯黛西霍特 我们的一名员工
以欺骗的手段把你弄来的

translation.en: -Her name's Barbara. -No, the woman producing is Barbara.
translation.zh:
-她叫芭芭拉
-不 本节目的女制片人才是芭芭拉

translation.en: The woman beside you is the current girlfriend of the man you once dated.
translation.zh:
你身旁的这个女人
其实是你前男友的现女友

translation.en: -Stephen? -Derek.
translation.zh:
-斯特夫？
-是德里克

translation.en: Camera five. Doorbell.
translation.zh: 五号摄像机准备 门铃声

translation.en: Another woman scorned, and she doesn't even know it yet.
translation.zh:
另一位被愚弄的女人来了
她还不知情

translation.en: Come in, Dr. Keyes.
translation.zh: 进来吧 吉斯医生

translation.en: Welcome to Kippie Kann Live.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到《凯皮卡安直播秀》

translation.en: Drama, pathos, life unfolding.
translation.zh: 狗血剧情 感染力 真实的生活

translation.en: -It's good. -It's Greek. Go to three, Phil.
translation.zh:
-很好
-简直是希腊文学 转到三号机 菲尔

translation.en: -Camera three, go. -Dr. Keyes, you're a gynecologist.
translation.zh:
-三号摄像机 拍摄
-吉斯医生 你是位妇科医生

translation.en: This woman posed as a patient...
translation.zh: 这个女人装作是病人

translation.en: ...to obtain personal information on her boyfriend, whom you once dated.
translation.zh:
来获取关于她男友的个人信息
也就是你的前男友

translation.en: But I examined her.
translation.zh: 但我给她做过检查

translation.en: -Well, that was all a setup. -Even the warts?
translation.zh:
-那都是个骗局
-连疣子都是吗？

translation.en: No, it was a joke. There were none, ever.
translation.zh: 不 那是个玩笑 我绝对没长疣子

translation.en: Ah, the apex. Joyce. She thinks she's doing a pre-interview for a cook-off.
translation.zh:
最精彩的来了 乔伊丝 她以为
自己是来参加烹饪大赛的预采访的

translation.en: That's what you told her, right, Stace?
translation.zh: 你就是这么对她说的 对吗？斯黛西

translation.en: Come in, Joyce.
translation.zh: 进来吧 乔伊丝

translation.en: Welcome to Kippie Kann Live.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到《凯皮卡安直播秀》

translation.en: Here comes the tough part. You can do it.
translation.zh: 最难的部分来了 你能行的

translation.en: Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎

translation.en: What's with the audience and all these--?
translation.zh: 这些观众是怎么回事 还有这些…

translation.en: -Lulu. -Oh, that's right.
translation.zh:
-露露
-对 没错

translation.en: You two go way back. But what about you two?
translation.zh: 你们认识很久了 但是你们两个呢？

translation.en: -Barb? -No, actually, that's Stacy.
translation.zh:
-芭布？
-不 其实 她叫斯黛西

translation.en: -Derek's current girlfriend. -What?
translation.zh:
-德里克的现女友
-什么？

translation.en: No cook-off today.
translation.zh: 今天没有烹饪大赛

translation.en: You lied to me? After everything I told you, you lied.
translation.zh:
你骗了我？我对你说了那么多事
你竟然骗我

translation.en: -Just like she did. -Are you referring to me?
translation.zh:
-就像她一样
-你是在说我吗？

translation.en: -Shut up. -What did you say?
translation.zh:
-闭嘴
-你说什么？

translation.en: Ladies, please. Let's fill the audience in, shall we?
translation.zh:
女士们 先给观众们
介绍下前情 好吗？

translation.en: We sent our own Kippie Kann crew to the Kaleidoscope Kitchen...
translation.zh:
我们把《凯皮卡安秀》的工作人员
派到了万花筒厨房

translation.en: ...posing as a crew for 48 Hours.
translation.zh: 伪装了48小时的员工

translation.en: -Then that was all a rose, too? -Ruse, yeah. Roll it.
translation.zh:
-那也是“花朵”吗？
-是花招 是的 播放

translation.en: -Why is she calling you Stacy, Barb? -Because that's her name.
translation.zh:
-她为什么叫你斯黛西 芭布？
-因为她就叫这名字

translation.en: No, actually, my name is Barb.
translation.zh: 不 其实我叫芭布

translation.en: The other woman you met's name was Stacy.
translation.zh: 你见到的另一个女人才叫斯黛西

translation.en: -No, she was Barb. -No.
translation.zh:
-不 她叫芭布
-不是

translation.en: -What? -Stimulating as ever.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-一如既往得刺激啊

translation.en: I'd say it's nice to see you, but then I'd be lying.
translation.zh:
我倒是想说很高兴见到你
但那是在撒谎

translation.en: Enjoy your meal.
translation.zh: 祝你用餐愉快

translation.en: I got sick that night, and not on purpose.
translation.zh: 那天晚上我不舒服 并不是故意的

translation.en: Stay put for more surprises when "Little Black Book" continues.
translation.zh:
请不要走开
下一节 小黑书将带来更多惊喜

translation.en: Ladies, stay in your seat, okay. We're still live.
translation.zh: 女士们 坐在座位上 我们还在直播

translation.en: -I'm sorry-- -Don't-- Don't say another word.
translation.zh:
-对不起…
-别…什么都别说了

translation.en: You wanted me to hate him? Mission accomplished. I do.
translation.zh:
你想让我恨他吗？
你目标达成了 我确实恨他

translation.en: But, as bad as he is, he is still too good for you.
translation.zh: 但是 尽管他很坏 你依然配不上他

translation.en: -If you could have a seat-- -This is completely unacceptable.
translation.zh:
-请你坐下…
-这绝对让人无法接受

translation.en: I'll sue this entire show for defamation of character.
translation.zh: 我要告整个节目毁谤人格

translation.en: This is America, and you are welcome to sue anyone.
translation.zh: 这里是美国 欢迎你去告任何人

translation.en: But that release you signed is ironclad.
translation.zh: 但是你签的协议是撼动不了的

translation.en: I was told we'd be discussing sexually transmitted diseases.
translation.zh: 我被告知我们要讨论的是性传播疾病

translation.en: Sexually transmitted diseases. That's an idea.
translation.zh: 性传播疾病 也是个好创意

translation.en: -Ninety seconds to air. -Ninety seconds.
translation.zh:
-90秒后开播
-90秒

translation.en: -I love it live. -You stoop to conquer.
translation.zh:
-我喜欢直播
-你为达目的不择手段

translation.en: Yeah. I stoop. We all do.
translation.zh: 是的 我不择手段 我们都一样

translation.en: I mean, look at where we work.
translation.zh: 搞清楚我们是干什么的

translation.en: We march thousands of Stacys through here every year.
translation.zh: 我们每年会拍摄成千上万的斯黛西

translation.en: We uncover their secrets. We spare no feelings.
translation.zh: 我们挖掘她们的秘密 不带任何情感

translation.en: But suddenly you get a conscience because you know one personally.
translation.zh:
但今天 你因为恰好认识她
就忽然良心发现了

translation.en: -You're unethical. -You're a hypocrite.
translation.zh:
-你太缺德了
-你太虚伪了

translation.en: -I'm a hypocrite? -This show is based on hypocrisy.
translation.zh:
-我虚伪？
-那没什么 节目本身就建立在虚伪上

translation.en: You wanna call me unethical? Okay.
translation.zh: 你想骂我缺德？没问题啊

translation.en: But don't judge me and then worship Kippie for doing the same thing.
translation.zh:
但凯皮也在做着同样的事
你别评判我而去崇拜她

translation.en: We're all swimming in the same cesspool.
translation.zh: 我们都是一路货色

translation.en: We work in reality TV, Ira. This is reality.
translation.zh:
我们做的是真人秀节目 埃拉
这才叫真实啊

translation.en: Forty-five seconds to air, Phil.
translation.zh: 45秒后开播 菲尔

translation.en: -Ira. -Underneath your seats...
translation.zh:
-埃拉
-在你们的座位底下…

translation.en: ...there's a Kippie Kann Live hat for each one of you. Kippie's a giver.
translation.zh:
为你们每人准备了一顶
《凯皮卡安秀》的帽子 凯皮很大方

translation.en: -I gotta get to the control room. -Carl, you wanna handle this?
translation.zh:
-我要去控制室
-卡尔 你想来处理一下吗？

translation.en: -Got it covered here. Thanks. -You're all in on this?
translation.zh:
-我来处理…谢谢
-你们都参与其中吗？

translation.en: -Everyone knew? -There is no conspiracy here.
translation.zh:
-你们全都知道？
-没有什么阴谋 亲爱的

translation.en: Just a good idea for sweeps.
translation.zh: 只是应对电视季的好创意而已

translation.en: -You can fight it. Seems pointless. -Lame. Really stupid.
translation.zh:
-你可以反抗 不过也没什么意义了
-差劲 蠢透了

translation.en: Or you could become a part of something bigger.
translation.zh:
或者你可以参与其中
成就一番更大的事业

translation.en: Something completely different. Now, of course I cannot--
translation.zh:
与之前的截然不同
现在当然我还不能说

translation.en: But trust me, gonna be big.
translation.zh: 但是相信我 一定会是番大事业

translation.en: -Huge, it's giant. -I'm talking about a real show here.
translation.zh:
-史无前例 盛况空前
-我在说一个真实的节目

translation.en: Changing formats. Breaking the fourth wall, and the fifth.
translation.zh: 摆脱格式化 打破第四堵墙 第五堵墙

translation.en: Kamikaze television without restriction...
translation.zh: 没有任何限制的神风电视台

translation.en: ...without hesitation, without Kippie.
translation.zh: 没有迟疑 没有凯皮

translation.en: It's a pretty exciting time to be on the ground floor.
translation.zh: 从一开始就参与进来 多么激动人心

translation.en: Thanks, Carl. But being that low doesn't interest me.
translation.zh:
谢了 卡尔
但是这太下作了 我没兴趣

translation.en: Don't fool yourself. What you did was lower than anything I've ever done.
translation.zh:
别自欺欺人了 孩子
你的所作所为 比我下作多了

translation.en: By the way, if you leave now, I will sue you for fraud.
translation.zh:
顺便说下
如果你现在离开 我会告你诈骗

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 好了 拜托

translation.en: It's your 15 minutes. It's not so bad.
translation.zh:
这是你的15分钟成名时间
不算太糟糕

translation.en: -It's my life. -It'll be over soon.
translation.zh:
-这是我的人生啊
-马上就要结束了

translation.en: I meant the show.
translation.zh: 我是说节目

translation.en: Five, four, three, two....
translation.zh: 五 四 三 二…

translation.en: Welcome back to Kippie Kann Live.
translation.zh: 欢迎继续收看《凯皮卡安直播秀》

translation.en: And "Little Black Book."
translation.zh: 以及“小黑书”节目

translation.en: I think it's time to bring out the man of the hour. What do you say?
translation.zh:
我觉得是时候请出这次的男主角了
各位观众 你们说呢？

translation.en: Are you ready for Derek?
translation.zh: 准备好迎接德里克了吗？

translation.en: Derek! Derek!
translation.zh: 德里克…

translation.en: Roll scream, roll doorbell.
translation.zh: 放尖叫声 门铃声

translation.en: Derek, come on out.
translation.zh: 德里克 出来吧

translation.en: What the--?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: Derek thought he was coming to a surprise promotion party for Stacy.
translation.zh:
德里克以为他是来参加
斯黛西的惊喜升职派对的

translation.en: You're in for it now!
translation.zh: 你这下麻烦大了

translation.en: Lulu? Rach-- Joyce.
translation.zh: 露露 瑞秋 乔伊丝

translation.en: What the hell's going on? What are you doing here?
translation.zh:
到底是怎么回事？
你们来这里做什么？

translation.en: -You can do it. -You wanna tell him, Stace, or shall I?
translation.zh:
-你可以的
-你想告诉他吗？斯黛西 还是我来？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I wanna tell him. I'll do it.
translation.zh: 我想告诉他 让我来说

translation.en: God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: -Tell him! -They're all here because of me.
translation.zh:
-告诉他
-她们全来到这里都是因为我

translation.en: They're all here because of me.
translation.zh: 她们全来到这里都是因为我

translation.en: See, after I heard about you and Lulu...
translation.zh: 在我听说你和露露的事后…

translation.en: -...I interviewed her. -You did what?
translation.zh:
-我采访了她
-你做了什么？

translation.en: You know, look under the hood first, she's Lulu Fritz.
translation.zh: 搞清楚状况 她可是露露弗里茨啊

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -We got around to the sex question-- -Wait a minute. You're not serious.
translation.zh:
-我们谈到性话题时…
-等下 你在开玩笑吧？

translation.en: She said that you guys did it, like, two, three times a day.
translation.zh: 她说你们曾经一天要做两三次

translation.en: It's funny. I mean, why would she lie like that?
translation.zh:
真有意思
我是说 她为什么要撒这样的谎呢？

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Purging. You can go next.
translation.zh:
-你在做什么？
-说清楚一切 等下你也可以

translation.en: Then I went to Rachel. I wanted to go straight to Joyce, but I couldn't.
translation.zh:
后来我去找了瑞秋
我本想直接去找乔伊丝的 但我不能

translation.en: Not right away, so I made up this story about warts...
translation.zh:
至少不能马上就去
所以我假装自己脚上长疣子了

translation.en: ...and went to Rachel, who I thought was a podiatrist...
translation.zh:
然后去找瑞秋
我以为她是个足科医生

translation.en: ...but it turns out, joke's on me.
translation.zh: 但结果…我闹笑话了

translation.en: You can shut the cameras off, because it's never gonna air.
translation.zh:
你们可以关掉摄像机了
因为这个不会播出来的

translation.en: We're live in 70 markets.
translation.zh: 我在70个地区同步直播

translation.en: Hi, Mom.
translation.zh: 你好 妈妈

translation.en: Then Barb and I browsed through your Palm.
translation.zh: 然后芭布和我翻看了你的手机

translation.en: -Barb who? -Barbara Campbell-hyphen-Dunn.
translation.zh:
-谁是芭布？
-芭芭拉坎贝尔邓恩

translation.en: Who sold me out for this show.
translation.zh: 她为了这个节目出卖了我

translation.en: Just like Carl's selling Kippie out.
translation.zh: 就像卡尔出卖凯皮那样

translation.en: At least, isn't that what you told me?

translation.en: Yes, yes, that's it. Turn the tables on us all. That's real. It's honest.
translation.zh:
没错 就是这样 反咬我们所有人
那才够真实 发自内心

translation.en: Phillip, get Carl.
translation.zh: 菲利普 镜头对准卡尔

translation.en: Jay, give me a shot to Carl.
translation.zh: 杰 给我一个卡尔的镜头

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Regurgitating.
translation.zh:
-你在干什么？
-想创意啊

translation.en: Something sexy just for you, Carl.
translation.zh: 为你准备的性感内容 卡尔

translation.en: -Who's Carl? -Stage left, crooked toupee.
translation.zh:
-卡尔是谁？
-舞台左侧 假发戴歪了的那个

translation.en: -Phillip, on four. -Camera four, go.
translation.zh:
-菲利普 四号摄像机
-四号摄像机 开始

translation.en: Get that camera off of me. Phil?
translation.zh: 把那台摄像机从我这移开 菲尔

translation.en: -Can't do this to him. -You hold that shot. Split the screen.
translation.zh:
-不能这么对他
-保持这个镜头 进行分屏

translation.en: Did you know that Carl comes in really close...
translation.zh:
你知道卡尔
有时会把镜头拉得特别近

translation.en: ...so that America can see that tape you wear on your face right there?
translation.zh:
好让全美国都看清
你脸上粘贴的透明胶带吗？

translation.en: Then he edits it out of the copy he gives you.
translation.zh:
在拿给你看的版本中
他会把这段剪掉

translation.en: -Back to Carl now. -And those tabloid leaks.
translation.zh:
-镜头转回到卡尔
-他还对八卦小报泄露消息

translation.en: Nice, really nice.
translation.zh: 真棒 太棒了

translation.en: You're burying Carl.
translation.zh: 你这是在毁掉卡尔

translation.en: I'm burying him, her, you, me.
translation.zh: 我在毁掉他 她 你 我

translation.en: We're all going down.
translation.zh: 我们都要完了

translation.en: Go to commercial.
translation.zh: 播放广告

translation.en: No commercial. I'm still running things. Stay with me, Phil.
translation.zh:
别播广告 现在一切还是我说了算
继续拍摄 菲尔

translation.en: Not you. You'll get promoted.
translation.zh: 你不会 你会升职

translation.en: I'm out of here. I can't top this.
translation.zh: 我要离开这儿 我无法超越这个了

translation.en: Anyway, Barb and I were playing with your Palm, and we stumbled...
translation.zh:
总之 芭布和我当时正在玩你的手机
后来我们无意中…

translation.en: ...across a lovely montage of Joyce...
translation.zh: 发现了一张乔伊丝和你的父母

translation.en: ...and your folks on holiday.
translation.zh: 在度假时拍的可爱照片

translation.en: Which is really odd, because you never bring girls home.
translation.zh:
那很奇怪
因为你从来不带女孩见父母

translation.en: -I don't. -You brought her.
translation.zh:
-我确实没有
-但你带她回去了

translation.en: She's different.
translation.zh: 她不一样

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: -Yeah, why? -Tell us!
translation.zh:
-是啊 为什么？
-告诉我们

translation.en: You know what? I'm not doing this.
translation.zh: 算了 我不干了

translation.en: -Why? -You wanna get out of my way?
translation.zh:
-为什么？
-你能让开吗？

translation.en: Is she better for you?
translation.zh: 她更适合你吗？

translation.en: I guess so.
translation.zh: 我猜是的

translation.en: Maybe I always knew it.
translation.zh: 也许我一直清楚这点

translation.en: Maybe that's why I had to meet her...
translation.zh: 也许这就是我为什么必须要见她

translation.en: ...and when I did, I understood, because I liked her too.
translation.zh:
当我见到她后 我就明白了
因为我也喜欢她

translation.en: I liked you so much. I want you to know that.
translation.zh: 我非常喜欢你 我想让你知道

translation.en: Not in a weird kind of way, but in a way that I thought...
translation.zh:
并不是奇怪的那种爱
而是在某种程度上我觉得…

translation.en: ...maybe in some alternate universe we could be friends.
translation.zh:
也许在另一个平行宇宙里
我们可以成为朋友

translation.en: Yesterday, you told me you were schmoozing up some new recruit...
translation.zh: 昨天 你告诉我 你在招募新球员

translation.en: ...and you're schmoozing Joyce?
translation.zh: 结果却一直是在和乔伊丝聊天？

translation.en: No, Joyce's brother.
translation.zh: 不是 是乔伊丝的弟弟

translation.en: Robbie Moore, the recruit, is Joyce's brother.
translation.zh: 罗比摩尔 那个新人是乔伊丝的弟弟

translation.en: Joyce hooked us up because she's trying to help me out.
translation.zh:
乔伊丝介绍我们认识的
因为她想帮我一把

translation.en: Then why wouldn't you have told me that straight up?
translation.zh: 那你问什么不对我直说呢？

translation.en: -I mean, why lie? -I never lied to you!
translation.zh:
-为什么要撒谎？
-我从没对你撒过谎？

translation.en: -"Omission is betrayal." -Yes.
translation.zh:
-“忽略不提就是背叛”
-棒极了

translation.en: Oh, okay. Now you're gonna tell me about betrayal?
translation.zh: 好吧 现在你要跟我谈背叛吗？

translation.en: What the hell do you call this?
translation.zh: 你觉得这算什么？

translation.en: I would never do this to you, ever.
translation.zh: 我永远不会这么对你 绝对不会

translation.en: No?
translation.zh: 不会吗？

translation.en: Then answer me this.
translation.zh: 那回答我

translation.en: If we shared our lives together...
translation.zh: 如果我们是共度人生的亲密爱人

translation.en: ...why didn't we share our lives?
translation.zh: 为什么不把自己的生活告诉对方呢？

translation.en: You shouldn't have to tell me everything, Derek.
translation.zh: 你确实没必要告诉我所有事 德里克

translation.en: But why wouldn't you want to?
translation.zh: 但你为什么不想告诉我呢？

translation.en: Unless there's somebody else you're waiting for.
translation.zh: 除非你还在等其他人的出现

translation.en: Someone who isn't afraid to say, "The past isn't past, Derek."
translation.zh:
那个人不会害怕说：
“过去的并没有成为过去 德里克”

translation.en: Or, "I really wanna meet your folks."
translation.zh: 或者“我真的很想见你的父母”

translation.en: Or, "I really, really hate hockey."
translation.zh: 或者“我真的非常讨厌冰球”

translation.en: -You do? -Oh, to the bottom of the ninth.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-从开始到第九局下半 全都讨厌

translation.en: -That's baseball. -You see that?
translation.zh:
-那是棒球
-瞧吧？

translation.en: I was just too afraid to be honest with you, with myself, because....
translation.zh:
我太害怕了
以至于不能坦诚面对你和我自己

translation.en: If I was really honest...
translation.zh: 因为 如果真的要我坦诚…

translation.en: ...gut-wrenching honest...
translation.zh: 绝对得坦诚…

translation.en: ...then I'd have to admit...
translation.zh: 那我就不得不承认

translation.en: ...that we weren't right the way you guys are.
translation.zh: 我们两个并没有你们两个般配

translation.en: Were we?
translation.zh: 不是吗？

translation.en: There's your show, Kippie.
translation.zh: 节目继续交给你了 凯皮

translation.en: "My Boyfriend Belongs With His Ex...
translation.zh: “我男朋友跟他前任才是天生一对

translation.en: ...and I Just Figured It Out."
translation.zh: 我刚刚终于想明白了”

translation.en: Sue me, Carl.
translation.zh: 告我去吧 卡尔

translation.en: Listen.
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: I'm fully aware that you may never speak to me again.
translation.zh: 我知道你可能永远不会再跟我说话了

translation.en: And I understand. I do.
translation.zh: 我理解 真的

translation.en: But before you leave, I want you to know that this whole idea...
translation.zh:
但是在你离开前 我想告诉你
这整个创意…

translation.en: ...wasn't planned out. It wasn't premeditated.
translation.zh:
并不是计划好的
它并不是事先有预谋的

translation.en: It presented itself, and then I guided it into this...
translation.zh:
它是自己呈现出来的
然后我将它引导成 这期节目

translation.en: ...event. Now, granted, it was dramatic. It was extreme...
translation.zh: 的确 它很戏剧性 很极端…

translation.en: ...but you dove head-on into the muck and came out...
translation.zh: 但是你直冲进了泥潭 出来时

translation.en: ...with this masterpiece.
translation.zh: 带来了这部杰作

translation.en: And I hope one day you can understand...
translation.zh: 我希望有一天你能够明白…

translation.en: ...that you got what you wanted, Stace:
translation.zh: 你得到了你想要的 斯黛西

translation.en: Your life back.
translation.zh: 你赢回了你的生活

translation.en: I should tear your eyes out right now.
translation.zh: 我现在该把你的眼睛挖下来

translation.en: But how will you ever be able to look at yourself in the morning?
translation.zh:
但那样你每天早上
怎么看到自己这张脸呢？

translation.en: Looks like we have an audience.
translation.zh: 看来我们还有观众

translation.en: Stay put. Kippie Kann Live and "Little Black Book"...
translation.zh:
请不要走开 《凯皮卡安直播秀》
和小黑书节目

translation.en: ...will be back after these words.
translation.zh: 广告之后 继续播出

translation.en: Move it, will you?
translation.zh: 你到底走不走？

translation.en: The question: How does a girl who jumps into a rabbit hole...
translation.zh: 提问 一个女孩跌进一个兔子洞里…

translation.en: ...plummeting into chaos, come out unchanged?
translation.zh:
陷入疯狂的混乱里
出来后 一切会毫无改变吗

translation.en: The answer:
translation.zh: 答案是…

translation.en: She doesn't.
translation.zh: 她不可能毫无改变

translation.en: No, it can't be closed now.
translation.zh: 不 别现在关门啊

translation.en: Stacy?
translation.zh: 斯黛西？

translation.en: Stacy Holt. It's Bean.
translation.zh: 斯黛西霍特 我是宾

translation.en: -King. Bean King from college. -Bean.
translation.zh:
-金 你大学同学 宾金
-宾

translation.en: Bean, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 宾 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: Inventory. We just finished.
translation.zh: 盘点存货 我们刚刚结束

translation.en: Bean There's yours? The coffee place?
translation.zh: 宾 这家咖啡店是你开的吗？

translation.en: I come here all the time. Of course it's yours.
translation.zh: 我经常来这里 当然是你开的

translation.en: Wow, this all makes sense in some cosmic way.
translation.zh: 一切都说得通了 真是神奇

translation.en: I get it. I get it.
translation.zh: 我懂了…

translation.en: This must sound crazy to you.
translation.zh: 你听起来一定会觉得很疯狂

translation.en: It's just--
translation.zh: 只是…

translation.en: I have spent a lifetime preparing for a lifetime.
translation.zh: 我用尽一生去准备过好一生

translation.en: And I was beginning to think it all went wrong somehow.
translation.zh:
我开始觉得
不知为何一切都出了差错

translation.en: But maybe you're the reason, Bean.
translation.zh: 但也许你就是原因 宾

translation.en: -For? -Everything.
translation.zh:
-什么的原因？
-一切啊

translation.en: Maybe you're the plan I was supposed to hang on to.
translation.zh:
或许 跟你在一起
才是我原本该坚定执行的人生规划

translation.en: Bean?
translation.zh: 宾？

translation.en: The 8:00 was sold out. Should I try the 10:20?
translation.zh:
8点场的卖光了
我们要不要试试10点20分的？

translation.en: Yeah, sure, honey. I'll be right there.
translation.zh: 好啊 当然可以 亲爱的 我马上就来

translation.en: That's my wife, Colleen.
translation.zh: 那是我妻子 科琳

translation.en: You should come meet her.
translation.zh: 你应该认识一下她

translation.en: Love to, but I just gotta go jump in the river now.
translation.zh: 我很乐意 但我现在要去跳河了

translation.en: Hey, come on, now.
translation.zh: 拜托 别这样

translation.en: Every plan I had for my life went so unbelievably wrong.
translation.zh:
我为人生制定的所有计划
全都错得离谱

translation.en: John Lennon said, "Life happens when you're busy making other plans."
translation.zh:
约翰列侬说：“当你忙于制定计划时
生活已然在进行中了”

translation.en: -Then he got shot. -Right.
translation.zh:
-然后他就被枪杀了
-没错

translation.en: You just gotta live. Stop planning your moves.
translation.zh:
你过好现在的生活就行
不要规划太多东西

translation.en: Let them happen. I mean, you might be surprised.
translation.zh:
让一切自然发生
结果或许会让你惊讶的

translation.en: Do you believe in happy endings, Bean?
translation.zh: 你相信美好结局吗？宾

translation.en: Yeah, I think so.
translation.zh: 是的…我信

translation.en: How about you?
translation.zh: 你呢？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我也相信

translation.en: Isn't that funny?
translation.zh: 很有趣 不是吗？

translation.en: I still do with all my heart.
translation.zh: 我还是发自内心地相信

translation.en: Even when the girl doesn't get the guy in the end.
translation.zh: 即便女孩最后没有得到心仪的男生

translation.en: Or, in my case, both guys.
translation.zh:
或者就我的情况而言
是两个心仪的男生

translation.en: -That's amazing. Congratulations. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
-你很幸福 恭喜你
-谢谢

translation.en: You go find your happy ending, Stacy Holt.
translation.zh: 去寻找你的美好结局吧 斯黛西霍特

translation.en: And thanks for the continuing patronage.
translation.zh: 还有 谢谢你长期以来的光顾

translation.en: By fall, I was ready to try again.
translation.zh: 失败过后 我准备好重新尝试

translation.en: A little bruised. A little humbled.
translation.zh: 受了点伤痛 变得更谦逊一些

translation.en: And, hopefully, a little smarter.
translation.zh: 希望还能变得聪明一点

translation.en: I believe we write our own stories.
translation.zh: 我相信自己的人生自己来书写

translation.en: And each time we think we know the end...
translation.zh:
每次当我们以为
自己知道结局的时候…

translation.en: ...we don't.
translation.zh: 其实我们并不知道

translation.en: Perhaps luck exists somewhere between...
translation.zh: 也许幸运存在于…

translation.en: ...the world of planning, the world of chance...
translation.zh: 有计划的世界 有机会的世界

translation.en: ...and in the peace that comes from knowing...
translation.zh: 以及因为知道我们无法做到无所不知

translation.en: ...that you just can't know it all.
translation.zh: 而产生的平和心态中

translation.en: You know, life's funny that way.
translation.zh: 正因如此 生活才有趣

translation.en: Once you let go of the wheel, you might end up...
translation.zh:
一旦你放开方向盘
你可能就会开往…

translation.en: ...right where you belong.
translation.zh: 你真正该属于的地方

translation.en: Wow, that is such an amazing story.
translation.zh: 这个故事太棒了

translation.en: I mean, you went through all of that, and here you are.
translation.zh:
你经历了这么多
终于成就了现在的你

translation.en: I can do this job, Jane.
translation.zh: 我可以胜任这份工作 简

translation.en: I've been preparing my whole life.
translation.zh: 我一生都在为它做准备

translation.en: It's too bad Diane's gone.
translation.zh: 黛安不在真是太遗憾了

translation.en: She is?
translation.zh: 不在吗？

translation.en: On assignment. She'll be back next week.
translation.zh: 去采访了 要下周才回来

translation.en: But before she left...
translation.zh: 但是她离开前…

translation.en: ...she told me, "If you find someone great for this job...
translation.zh:
她告诉我 “如果你发现了
适合这份工作的人…

translation.en: ...I mean, perfect...
translation.zh: 我是说 完美人选…

translation.en: ...don't let them go."
translation.zh: 不要放走他们”

translation.en: Welcome aboard, Stacy.
translation.zh: 欢迎加入 斯黛西

translation.en: You mean...
translation.zh: 你是说…

translation.en: -...I got the job? -You got the job.
translation.zh:
-我得到这份工作了？
-你得到这份工作了

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.zh: 恭喜

translation.en: Stay here. I'll go check Diane's calendar.
translation.zh: 稍等一下 我去查看下黛安的行程

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Hello, Mama? I got the job. -You got the job?
translation.zh:
-你好 妈妈 我拿到这份工作了
-你拿到了？

translation.en: -You got the job! She got the job! -I got the job! I got the job!
translation.zh:
-你拿到工作了 她拿到工作了
-我拿到工作了…

translation.en: -She got the job! -It's amazing, amazing, amazing.
translation.zh:
-她拿到那份工作了
-太棒了…

translation.en: -I knew it. -What could be better than this?
translation.zh:
-我就知道…
-还有什么能比这更好？

translation.en: Mama, what could be better?
translation.zh: 妈妈 还有什么能比这更好？

translation.en: Are you Jane?
translation.zh: 你是简吗？

translation.en: I'm Carly Simon. I'm here for the pre-tape.
translation.zh: 我是卡莉西蒙 我是来做预录制的

translation.en: Jane, Jane, Jane.
translation.zh: 简…

translation.en: -Are you okay? Are you okay? -Hello? Stacy?
translation.zh:
-你没事吧？
-喂？斯黛西？

translation.en: Honey? Honey, are you there?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你在听吗？

translation.en: Hello? Hi, I've just come into the studio, and I think your friend fainted.
translation.zh:
喂？我刚来到制片厂
我觉得你朋友好像晕倒了

translation.en: She fainted? Oh, my God. Who is this?
translation.zh: 她晕倒了？天啊 你是谁？

translation.en: My name is Carly Simon. I'm just here to meet with Jane.
translation.zh: 我叫卡莉西蒙 我是来见简的

translation.en: Oh, I think she's coming around again, so I'll give her the phone.
translation.zh:
我觉得她又醒过来了
我现在把电话给她

translation.en: Hello? Mama?
translation.zh: 喂？妈妈？

translation.en: Gone. Are you really Carly Simon?
translation.zh: 挂了 你真的是卡莉西蒙吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, I just-- -I can't believe this.
translation.zh:
-是的 我刚刚…
-我简直不敢相信

translation.en: -You just really made my life. -Are you Jane?
translation.zh:
-你让我高兴疯了
-你是简吗？

translation.en: -My name is Stacy Holt. -Stacy.
translation.zh:
-我是斯黛西霍特
-斯黛西

translation.en: I just got a job here. Please don't tell Diane that I fainted.
translation.zh:
我刚拿到这份工作
请不要告诉黛安我晕倒了

translation.en: -You really are Carly Simon. -You're okay?
translation.zh:
-你真的是卡莉西蒙
-你真的没事吗？

translation.en: This is the most-- Yes, thank you. I'm so mortified.
translation.zh:
这简直…
是的 谢谢 我太丢人了

translation.en: I hug people when I'm embarrassed.
translation.zh: 我尴尬的时候就会抱人

translation.en: So do I. I do exactly the same thing.
translation.zh: 我也是 我也有这个习惯

translation.en: I think this is just about the greatest day of my life.
translation.zh: 我觉得这是我一生中最棒的一天了

translation.en: So thank you. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 非常感谢

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你
